text: Someone recommended this to me and I'm so happy I tried it. I've suffered from years of too-thin hair caused by medical reasons and got so sick of looking at fine, thin, flat, wispy hair everyday. I already have some great hair care products to make my thin hair LOOK thicker, but needed my hair to actually GET thicker and re-grow. Well, this stuff seems to do the job it claims to do. I used the first month's supply and my hair is already fuller, the sections that were sparse are filling in and my hair styles so much better because there's more hair to work with. It's also growing faster than before. I just purchased my second box and am going to continue to use it. I'm a major skeptic when it comes to products like this because I don't have time or money to waste, but I noticed the difference in my hair's thickness within 2.5 to 3 weeks after starting the Viviscal. I also received comments about my hair from others who know me as well. Worth the $$ because it works.

This stuff goes on with the consistency of petroleum jelly and provides a good barrier of protection for very dry or irritated skin, but it's not something that absorbs well like a hand cream.I like to use it mostly for my hands and feet that get really dry as the weather gets colder, but I always put cotton socks and cotton gloves after I apply it, because it's an ointment and I don't want greasiness all over my clothing or bedding. It's also good for any skin irritations, scratches or little scrapes.The touch-free applicator isn't that helpful to me because I'm not going to apply it to the the bottom of my feet and then put some on my lips or face using the same applicator. Ickk. Maybe if you're using the tube for only one purpose (like diaper rash for instance), then the touch-free applicator might be useful. Just mark the tube somehow so you don't forget, lol...The ointment itself is pretty good as long as you don't mind the gooey petroleum consistency, but a regular tube or a tub container might be better if you're using it for multiple purposes. 3.5 stars.

I've been finding these boards so useful for all sorts of things, from having a tray to set snacks out on, to line a serving tray with, to gather supplies for a recipe I'm making and rolling cookie dough just to name a few. I like being able to have a clean cutting surface when I'm trying to make something quickly and don't have time to wash a big cutting board in between messy ingredients. It's easy to grab one of these to use for veggies and another for meats or other ingredients. They're durable, so it keeps the counter from getting cut or scratched and the surface holds up well so wet foods don't soak through easily. The raised edge helps prevent liquids from seeping over. I chopped up lots of ingredients for a crockpot soup the other day and it held up nicely with no leaks. While they're not a replacement from a full-size cutting board for someone who cooks a lot, they do the job well and are very convenient to keep on hand for miscellaneous cutting/chopping and numerous other purposes in the kitchen.

This label maker has worked great for me so far. When I first opened the box, I was surprised how compact it is for how much you can do with it. It has a built-in carrying handle on the bottom, which makes moving it around easy, but it's still very lightweight.I quickly noticed that it's very well-designed and extremely easy to use. Set-up is as simple as plugging in the A/C adapter, inserting a tape cartridge and turning it on. It's user-friendly the whole way through. There's a Quick-Start guide booklet included that makes it easy to look up anything that's not self-explanatory (like choosing from the HUGE assortment of symbols, pictures/icons, frames, how to save labels and using the Epson label editing software to transfer things from your computer to the label maker).You can make labels for obvious things like file folders or name tags, but you can also make barcode labels, wraps for cables, ribbons for party favor bags, hair bows or pony tail holders, gift tag and decorations for greeting cards just to name a few. If you use the Epson label editing software and connect the label maker to your computer with the included USB cord, you can add your own personal logo or even a photo to your labels. So, if you need a label maker that let's you make more creative and professional-looking labels, this is a great machine.I've made quite a few types of labels and decorative ribbons so far and they look great, plus they're fun to make and don't take much time. It allows you to customize fonts, size, how many lines you want on a label and more. It shows a sample of how the label will look on the screen above the keyboard. If you're happy with that, just hit 'print' and it quickly sends out your label and even cuts if for you.The label maker comes with one black on white sample ½" tape, so to make things like ribbons, cable wraps or different size labels, you'll have to purchase these additionally. No batteries are included, so if you don't want to use the A/C adapter, you'll need six AA batteries. It also includes a CD with the label editing software (PC only). Mac users need to download it from Epson site. Instructions on this are included.About the only downside is the cost of purchasing additional tape cartridges, especially if you plan to print lots of labels or ribbons. It can add up, but you're paying for the convenience of being able to make stand-out, professional labels easily and quickly from home. If you're a business or freelance professional or just want to be able to create attractive custom labels or tags that include graphics or logos, this is the ideal label maker.

I got a large sample of this eye cream with another product I bought and have been using it for about 10 days or so now. It's definitely the best eye cream I've ever used. It has a light and airy consistency, sort of like a whipped matte finish gel, which is the best way I can describe it. Since it's matte, there's no shine or greasiness. It immediately makes the under eye area look hydrated, firmer and younger. I even put it on in the morning under my eye makeup and it doesn't cause my eyeliner or mascara to smudge like some eye creams tend to do. Besides the immediate, noticeable improvement, the retinol is great at long-term wrinkle improvement and prevention. I noticed a little sandpapery feel in the areas where I'd been applying it about 3 or 4 days after starting the cream. The retinol had started to gently exfoliate sun-damaged areas of the skin, so I can tell there's more than just superficial improvement. In my experience, retinol works wonders to make skin look younger and this cream has a high retinol concentration. So if you use this cream consistently, the skin cell turnover is increased and there's less wrinkling, a reduction in sun damage and a more youthful eye area. It's also a good product for women as young as their 20's because it helps to prevent wrinkling around the eye area before it even starts. I rarely buy anything but drugstore moisturizers and creams, but this product is one that's worth it's price tag. 5 stars.

This is an interesting phone; there are lots of things I like and a few things that annoy me about it. This is my second Windows phone and being someone who's more used to Apple products, I have to say I like the Windows phone OS better than I expected. It took a little time to get used to and appreciate the differences between iOS and Windows, but though they're different, Windows is user-friendly and very easy to customize the phone to suit what things you use most often and what your preferences are.First the good...I love the camera on this phone. It's the best of any phone I've had because the pictures are sharp, bright and clear. There are front and rear facing cameras. As someone who enjoys photography, I appreciate being able to take high-quality photos on my phone when I don't have my camera with me.The phone comes with a matching slip-on cover, one screen protector and ear buds. When I ordered this phone, I assumed I'd have to get these things seperately, but I was pleasantly surprised they were included and it saved me the time and money of ordering additional accessories.The size of this phone is nice, yet it still feels fairly lightweight. I have a smaller smartphone that weighs more than this one.The screen color is bright and vivid and the sound is also good when I'm listening to music or videos.I'm using it with AT&T service and so far, so good. Good sound quality and no dropped calls.The dual-SIM card slots is another useful feature for some people.The battery life is pretty good compared to other phones I have.Like many smartphones, there's limited internal memory, so it's necessary to purchase a storage card. Here's an example of a couple that work well with this phone:SanDisk 32GB Ultra Class 10 Micro SDHC up to 48MB/s with Adapter (SDSDQUAN-032G-G4A) [Newest Version]Samsung Electronics 32GB EVO Micro SDHC with Adapter Up to 48MB/s Class 10 Memory Card (MB-MP32DA/AM)Things like apps, music downloads, photos and videos can be stored on this card and you won't max out your phone's memory. A 32GB card is more than enough for the average user. It's easy to set up so things automatically are stored to this card instead of on your phone's internal memory.A couple things that could be improved on this phone:-The Windows 'home' icon near the bottom of the phone is small and light/medium gray in color. I have perfect 20/20 vision and it seems a little hard to see against the black of the phone. It's especially hard to see in low light or dark conditions. The same goes for the back arrow and the search icons that are on either side of the Windows home icon. These should definitely be lit up more. On my other Windows phone, they're lit bright white and easy to see day or night.-The most annoying thing about this phone is the way the touchscreen works. Often when I'm scrolling down the home screen or through the list of apps on the phone, apps that I happen to touch as I'm scrolling along will open unintentionally. I'll have to close the app and resume what I'm doing, but this happens often and it seems like the screen is too sensitive or something. But, at other times, I'll have to press hard to get things to work. For example, I was deleting photos and had to press the trash icon very hard to get it to delete. I haven't experiened this with other phones I've had, Windows or otherwise.So my overall opinion of this phone is fairly positive but the touchscreen issue is the biggest drawback for me. There are lots of nice features like the high-quality photos, the light weight for a large screen size, the 2 SIM card slots, the included accessories, etc., but for me to really like this phone the touch screen would need to be improved because it's annoying for apps to open as I'm gently scrolling down the screen. It never happens with my other Windows phone, so it can't just be the way I'm using it. I'm not sure why it doesn't happen constantly and I notice it when I'm doing some things more than others, but it continues to be a problem.Though I'm giving it 4 stars, I'd probably give it between a 3.5 to 3.8 if I could due to the frequent annoyance of the touchscreen. If my opinion changes as I used the phone more, I'll update my rating/review.

I got this speaker to use with a laptop and an iPad Mini and it worked perfectly with both. It comes partially charged, so I hooked the included USB cord to my computer and it fully charged in under 30 minutes. It's just a small, hockey puck sized speaker, but the sound quality is quite good and projects well around the room. It says the Bluetooth works up to about 30 feet, but I was able to go to another room in the house (more than 30 feet) and still had full sound. Operation is simple: just charge, pair with Bluetooth on your device, turn on and that's it. There's +/- for volume adjustment. It comes with an instruction guide and a nice black velvety drawstring carrying case for easy portability. The battery charge lasts for about 4 hours. It's a convenient little accessory for having a speaker nearby, rather than moving the laptop, computer or tablet. The size makes it perfect for travel too.

I got this phone to replace an older AT&T GoPhone and am loving it so far. I considered getting the new iPhone, but didn't want a contract or to pay full retail price for an unlocked iPhone. This Nokia phone seemed to have the features I wanted at a fraction of the iPhone price, so after using it for about a month now, I'm so glad I got this phone. It's a bargain for how much it has to offer.I never had a Windows phone before, so I wasn't sure what to expect. I was pleasantly surprised at how many things you can customize on this phone compared to the other phone I had. Icons of different apps and features can be moved around, resized and you can choose which ones you want and don't want on your main screen. It's easy to customize everything from ringtones, backgrounds, security/passwords, apps, storage, and much more. From the 'User Settings Menu', you can totally personalize the phone to suit your preferences. I use mostly Apple products, so the Windows interface took some getting used to, but it's pretty simple to use and is easy to customize the phone to what features/apps are most important to you.The phone itself works great: clear reception on calls, no dropped calls, easy to adjust volume, no technical problems or freezing. Videos and YouTube play nicely and the speakers project sound well. This is the second Nokia phone I've had and like the first, this one works well and is trouble-free. I've been using it a lot and it's never frozen or not worked when I need it.I did find out that this phone doesn't have too much internal storage space and after adding some apps, photos, videos, etc, the phone was getting close to its capacity. I purchased a Professional Ultra SanDisk 32GB MicroSDHC Nokia Lumia 635 card is custom formatted for high speed, lossless recording! Includes Standard SD Adapter. (UHS-1 Class 10 Certified 30MB/sec) seperately. 32GB seems like more than enough space, so now I can add lots of apps, take photos, video and download music without worrying about the phone's storage being maxed out. In the phone's user settings, you can choose what things (like apps, for example) that you want to automatically be saved to the storage disk instead of on the phone. I think this option comes up when you first put the disk into the back of the phone and the phone automatically recognizes you added a disk.The other accessories that I purchased for this phone are:Fosmon Nokia Lumia 635 SLIM-Fit Case [DURA FRO] Flexible TPU Cover - Retail Packaging (Black)Good basic protection for everyday use.Fosmon Anti-Glare (Matte) Screen Protector Shield for Nokia Lumia 635 - Retail Packaging (3 Pack)Cuts down on fingerprints, glare, easy to put on and keep the screen scratch-free.SOGAÂ® Rapid Auto Vehicle Micro USB Car Charger Adaptor for Nokia Lumia 510, 520, 521, 525, 530, 630, 635, 810, 822, 900, 920, 925, 928, 929 Icon, 930, 1020, 1520 Cell PhoneVery convenient if you're out and your battery gets low.These have all worked great with my phone.There are just a few things I don't like about this phone. It feels sort of heavy if I'm holding it for a while with longer calls. Maybe I'm just not used to a smartphone or should get a bluetooth headphone, but it's just something I noticed.The battery life is okay, but seems like it could be better. I'm charging at least every other day and I'm not someone who uses my phone constantly. If I use the phone a lot, I charge it once a day. This is one of the reasons the car charger is helpful.If you love taking selfies, this probably isn't the phone for you because there's no front-facing camera. The photo quality is good, but not great.There have a been a couple occasions where an app didn't work with the phone, which is more of a Windows issue than a problem with the phone itself. For example, I downloaded the U-Stream app, but it wouldn't work. Annoying, but in general, most of the apps I downloaded work as they're supposed to.For the price, I feel like this phone is a steal. I did quite a bit of research prior to ordering and couldn't find another smartphone in this price range with as many features and good quality.I really like having a good quality smartphone with so many useful features without dealing with a contract. I definitely recommend this phone for someone who wants a versatile smartphone at a good price. 4.5 stars.

My skin tends to be high-maintenence: combination oily/dry, sensitive, breaks out with some products and changes with the seasons. Because of these things, I have a very hard time finding products that make my skin look good without adding extra shine, are overly drying or contain ingredients that cause breakouts. I've tried expensive department store products as well as drugstore brands and have only had mixed results. This Morea Naturals serum is really a good fit for my skin. My complexion immediately feels smoother, more toned and hydrated, but without added greasy shine that I find in other products. I use this serum in the evening after using my cleanser and in the morning before I put on my sunscreen and foundation. My skin looks great and has a nice, even finish to it as if I'm wearing a primer. It minimizes pores too. I love that it's unscented (I have alleriges to products with perfumes) and contains natural ingredients. Also no parabens and cruelty-free. It's a good price for this size bottle too. This is a product that I'll continue to use because of the improvements I see in my skin.

This is the first time I used a screen protector on my phone and I just love these. It was easier to put on than I expected and it gives the phone screen a matte, anti-glare finish. It cuts down on fingerprints too. The pack comes with three protectors, a lint cloth and a plastic card to help ensure a bubble-free application. Just be sure your phone screen is completely clean and dust-free before applying. I used a flashlight to make sure there was no dust or fingerprints. Or, put them on in a brightly lit or sunny room. Very happy with this product!

This pillow is dense and substantial, but the medium-softness memory foam has just the right balance of support and cushioning for the head and neck. It keeps my neck in the right position for sleeping which seems to reduce much of the neck and shoulder pain I've been waking up with for a while. I typically sleep on my back, but occasionally turn to the side and this pillow is equally comfortable for both. I like the queen size pillow, since I've found many standard size memory foam pillows to be way too small. The pillow does smell mildly like kerosene or something at first, but it seems to fade after a couple days. I put the pillow inside a protector and case, so that also makes the scent less obvious. If it weren't for that, I'd likely give it 5 stars because it is extremely comfortable, is a nice size, has helped with my neck pain and stays cool unlike some memory foam pillows. It also comes in a re-useable zipper case for storage/travel.

I discovered that the Nokia 635 doesn't come with all that much storage space, so I got this microdisk so my apps, photos, videos and such could be stored on the disk to free up space on my phone. It's a super tiny disk that fits inside the phone near the battery. I think 32GB is a decent size for most people unless you have tons of videos, photos or apps on your phone. It's easy to move apps and other things that are already stored on your phone onto this disk. It's supposed to help improve the battery life on the phone and make saving pics/videos faster and have less chance of losing them. So far, it seems to be working good with my phone. It was easy to install and the phone recognized the card right away. It comes with an SD adapter too. Yes, it's kind of expensive for such a tiny disk, but without it, the Nokia's storage space can fill up really fast.

This slim-fitting case is just what I wanted for my Nokia 635. It fits perfectly, stays on, adds some grip so that phone doesn't slip from my hand and doesn't interfere with the phone's buttons/slots/holes/camera. The back is matte finish and the sides and front edges are glossy, so it looks nice. There might not be as much protection if the phone is dropped as with some of the cases that have a bigger, bulkier fit, but it seems like it will protect the phone from scratches, bumps and basic every day use. For a slim-fitting case that fits, it's just right.

This is a pretty nice comforter set for the price. I like the fun zig-zag pattern of the comforter and it actually goes with quite a few colors of bedrooms. It's a light to light/medium weight comforter that feels soft, airy and cozy. I'd think it would be good for most seasons, though it might be too light for cold winter nights where an extra blanket or two might be needed.I like that this set comes with two sets of sheets (2 different coordinating colors), so one is available when the other one is being washed/dried. There are two pillowcases of each color (taupe and bluish-lavender) and two shams that match the comforter so you won't ever have a shortage of pillowcases. Everything coordinates very well in this set. The sheets wash and dry well and come out of the dryer without too many wrinkles. The fabric is a soft, smooth micro-fiber. It has a silky feel and look to it.The whole set including the comforter arrives in a re-useable mesh drawstring hamper which is useful for storage or to use as a laundry bag. I'm using it as a clothes hamper and it's just perfect and doesn't take up too much space.Everything in this set arrived in good shape. There were some wrinkles in the comforter which is to be expected. There were some random loose fuzzy strings on the comforter (not attached, just fuzz) and I used a lint-roller to neaten it up on the bed.I'd say it's a fairly good quality comforter set for the price, though it's not a fancy, luxurious, last-forever set by any means. For a teen, college student, spare bedroom or just a nice looking everyday full/queen comforter set with an affordable price, this fits the bill.

I'm loving this air purifier & sound machine so far. I have severe indoor dust and mold allergies, plus I need some kind of white noise to help block out sounds in the house while I sleep, so this helps solve both of those problems in one machine.It comes mostly assembled, just put in the two filters, plug it in and it's ready to go. Though it comes with a complete user guide, I found the buttons on top of the unit very simple and intuitive to use right from the start. The unit is very attractive, surprisingly compact and the neutral colors are pleasant and should go with most decors.The air purifier can be used either alone or at the same time as the white noise/sleep sounds. I really like the option of running just one or both together.The sound machine has six different sounds: rain, two different lullabies, ocean, crickets and white noise. The volume can be adjusted up and down and there's also a 15, 30 and 60-minute timer. The sounds are all soothing, relaxing and peaceful, no matter what your age. You can't help but de-stress and feel calmer listening to the sound of the rain or rolling ocean waves. The crickets chirping on a quiet night is pretty cool too. For a baby or young child, the two versions of the lullaby (Schubert and Brahms) are a nice feature. The sounds and white noise setting (sounds like a constant static) are also perfect for blocking out other noise in the house or outside when you're trying to get some sleep. The volume goes up to a decent level. It's not quite as loud as the average box fan on a high setting for example, but it is very effective at blocking background noise, especially considering this is a fairly small machine. If you turn the air purifier on the highest setting (3), that adds quiet a bit of a rushing air sound if you want something louder to block background or outdoor noise. You can also lower the volume to the lowest setting if you want just a light, repetitive sound to help you sleep.The air purifier has three settings (low, medium and high). It's almost silent on #1, a light fan sound on #2 and a louder fan type sound on 3. It has two filters: a true HEPA (for pollen, pet hair, dust and smoke) and an odor filter (VOC's, pet odors, musty smells and cooking odors). The fan from the air purifier sends air upward from the unit, so it helps circulate the air in the room but you don't feel air blowing like you do with a fan. I noticed it helped the air in my bedroom smell fresher after running it for short time. It helps pull dust out of the air, so I find less dust on electronics and counter tops. There's a 1, 4 and 8 hour timer setting for the air purifier. There's also a filter replacement indicator. Because my indoor allergies can get really bad, I love that this machine sucks dust and dirt out of the air so I can sleep better at night.There's a 3-year limited warranty on this product. Just going by how it looks, it seems well-made and high quality throughout. The odor filter lasts 6 months and the HEPA filter lasts one year. This air purifier comes in an extremely sturdy box with handle slots for easy carrying. The design and information on the box explains everything you need to know about the product and its many uses.I'm already breathing and sleeping better thanks to this machine. I even run it during the day at times if I need to have some quiet, relaxing sounds to feel calmer and less stressed out. 5 stars.

I've had this little vegtable brush for a few years now and it's still holding up so well. It's perfect for scrubbing potatoes, carrots, and other veggies. Easy to wash too. The rounded shape makes it comfortable to hold with no slipping. Great purchase!

This 2014 Collector's Holiday Barbie is beautiful and festive. Her long, flowy red and golden gown is gorgeous. I really like the sparkly gold eyeshadow for an added touch, her makeup is pretty, nice hairstyle, red nail polish and ornate gold necklace. Her entire look just radiates holiday glamour and style. There's also a stand for display that's included. The box she comes in is lovely too, red with fancy gold trim and designs. She's perfect for a Barbie doll collector or as a gift for a girl who appreciates Barbies. She's not like a regular Barbie with arms that bend, so if you're getting this doll for a child, make sure they're old enough to appreciate a collector's edition Barbie.

I really liked this case at first when I put it on my new phone because it was very easy to put on, fits well, seems very protective all around and has an attractive look, but by the first night I noticed a small gap on the side where the rubber and plastic meet. I was able to push it back on and all seemed fine, but it kept happening. It was gapping on both sides by day two. I'm not sure if I got a defective case or it's a design flaw, but I'm sending it back.

These liners arrived at the perfect time for me. I recently cleaned the inside of my refrigerator and lined the shelves with paper towels in an attempt to keep them clean. That didn't work so well, but I hate having mess from food, drinks or cans of pet food all over the refrigerator. When I saw these shelf liners, I had to try them.They're made of a soft, but heavy weight fabric that feels like thick felt. It's absorbant, which is good for containing spills. They're also reversible and both sides have an interesting pattern. I cut them to the size of my refrigerator shelves and now I don't have to waste time wiping off food spills or crumbs. I tried putting a few of these through the wash and found them to hold up well. I dried them by laying them flat on a drying rack since they might shrink in the dryer. They're not stick-on liners, so they do shift a little on occasion, but it's not a problem. For the refrigerator, I cut them so they're wide enough to slightly curve over the side edges of the shelves, so they stay in place well.Now I plan to try these for lining my bathroom drawers and some cabinet shelves in my kitchen where I keep my plates and glasses since they add cushioning to the surface. There are so many possible uses for these liners, even to protect glass or ceramics for packing. The 2-pack covers quite a bit of space depending on the size of what you're lining. I'm so glad I found these. They're already cutting down on my cleaning time and the color and pattern look great in my refrigerator.
I love writing with this pen. The ink flows smoothly and it doesn't easily smudge. I can't think of another fountain pen you can get for this price. Love it!

This book offers a well-rounded crash course on all things social media. It goes over the various social media sites, from the big names to the lesser known but still important ones. It explains how each site works, what types of businesses they work best for and some of the important rules and etiquette to follow to use each of these sites effectively for your social media strategy.If you don't already have a social media strategy in place or aren't sure if yours is working for you or your business, there's also plenty of information on how to best position your business in the social media universe. It can help you learn about what works, what doesn't work and how to promote effectively without coming across as using social media sites solely to get sales and turning off potential customers.There's also numerous interesting ideas on how to get creative with your marketing and how social media can help generate lots of interest in your business. It's very helpful for showing people how to build a professional presence online and earn the respect and attention of customers using social media. Whether you want to learn about social media for promoting your freelance business, a product, a book, event, brand, company or organization, this book covers lots of ground.As beneficial as social media can be to a business, it needs to be done right to make a positive impact. This book goes into some of the things to avoid doing so you don't waste your time or harm your reputation.The information is very up-to-date and presented in a clear and concise way throughout the chapters. There's also a useful glossary in the back for social media terms and sites you might not have heard of.This book is a must-read for those who aren't currently taking advantage of all the free or inexpensive marketing possibilities social media has to offer and also for those who just want to learn more effective and targeted strategies to get the word out about their product, service, book, etc.

I got these as replacement heads for my Sonicare brush and am very happy with them. They clean very well, are firm enough, but don't irritate my gums or cause sensitivity. My teeth are whiter and it removes plaque so they actually look like they were cleaned in the dentist's office. After my last Philips replacement heads wore out, I went back to my regular non-electric toothbrush for a while and my teeth started looking stained and getting plaque. As soon as I got these Diamondclean brush heads, my teeth looked great again after just a couple brushings. Definitely worth the price if you want cleaner teeth and healthier gums. I used to have a problem with sensitive gums that would bleed almost every time I brushed and flossed and once I started using the Sonicare, it never happened again. I will get these replacement heads again next time I need them.

I got this to replace an older breadmaker of another brand. I'm mostly liking it so far, but there are a couple of things that could be better.Here's a breakdown of my main thoughts about this breadmaker:Assembly - Easy and fast. I washed the breadmaker bin and paddle with sudsy, warm water, put them together and they go into the breadmaker unit easily. There's nothing else to assemble.Menu - The digital menu is easy to use. You select the menu setting for the particular bread you're making, the weight of the loaf you want to make (1lb, 1.5 lb or 2 lb) and the crust color setting. I found the crust color setting a little confusing and ended up with very dark crust with a few loaves. I will comment more about this later in the review. There's also a start/stop button. If you need to stop the breadmaker for some reason before it automatically finishes, just hold down the start/stop button and it turns off.Quality - The overall breadmaker seems to be high quality. The materials are nice, it's attractive and sleek on the countertop, it operates quiety, it doesn't travel on the countertop, everything feels solid and like it will last a long time.Bread Pan - It's like a bucket with a handle, so it's easy to lift out and hold. It gets hot, so either use pot holders to remove the bread pan when it's done, or wait until it's cool enough to touch. The bread comes out of the pan easily. I just turned it upside down on a cutting board and just tapped it until it came out.Cleaning - The breadmaker, pan and paddle are easy to clean. The breadmaker can be dusted out if you get flour or a few breadcrumbs inside the base. Either use a cloth or carefully turn the whole unit upside down and pour out any loose crumbs so they don't burn the next time you make bread. I cleaned the pan and dough paddle by hand with warm water and dish detergent. It can't be put in the dishwasher.Bread - It took some experimenting since I was used to the much older breadmaker I've used for years. I tried making several different types of bread from the included recipe book and the results varied. The loaves were mostly good, but the crust color setting selector was confusing to me. It's just a small icon and I couldn't tell which was the lightest or darkest setting. The crust of two of the loaves I made was way too dark, nearly burned. This was the biggest issue I had with the breadmaker. The bread itself was good and had a nice texture to it. There's a window on top so you can see how the bread is doing without opening the lid. It's helpful unless it gets steamed up. Everything is automated, so once you push the start button, there's nothing to do except wait for your bread to be done. Some recipes have ingredients to be added after the initial mixing, so there's a specific beep that happens to let you know when to add these things. It's helpful to be around to check on the bread dough in the early stage of the mixing cycle in case it's too dry or moist and you need to add more liquid or flour. I didn't find this necessary, but every recipe is different, so it helps to open the lid or look through the window just in case.Gluten Free - When I first saw this breadmaker, I thought it was only for making gluten-free breads. It's basically a regular breadmaker that also has several settings for making gluten-free bread and cakes. There are eight gluten-free recipes in the included recipe book. The book gives instructions and tips for making gluten-free breads and cakes. If you're making any gluten-free recipes, you'll need to buy special gluten-free dry yeast, a gluten-free pre-mix and other assorted ingredients and then just select one of the gluten-free settings.Jam/Compote - This is an easy way to make homemade fruit jam with relatively few ingredients. I made the strawberry jam and it took about an hour. Afterward, I put it in the refrigerator for about another hour to let it firm up. Very tasty on a slice of fresh, warm bread.Other things - Though I didn't try making all of these, this breadmaker can make pizza dough, lemon cade, rum cake and even pasta.Overall thoughts - I like this breadmaker because it's fairly versatile in the kinds of things you can make. It's well-made, attractive and easy to operate and clean. I personally had some trouble with the crust color setting which ruined two or three of the loaves I made and I still can't get the crust quite light enough for my preference. The medium setting was definitely too dark for me. I am still experiementing with taking the bread out earlier so this doesn't happen. I will update my review once I get this figured out. I don't need to have gluten-free bread, but I like having the option in case I'm making bread or cake for someone who is gluten-sensitive. To get nit-picky, my older breadmaker has the nice feature of a cooling fan that runs once the bread baking is finished so the pan is cool to touch and the bread is easier to handle without using pot holders. I'd like this breadmaker more if it had that feature. I was hoping this breadmaker would be a little more fool-proof in terms of turning out perfect loaves every time, but after a couple weeks I'm still experimenting in getting the bread and crust exactly how I want it. Not sure if this is an issue with the breadmaker or just because I'm used to using a different one. The current price seems about right considering the quality and features of this breadmaker.Based on my experience so far with it, I'd give it between 3.5 and 4 stars.

My two cats have been eating Natural Balance products almost exclusively since they were kittens. The few times I picked up another type or brand of food, I switched back to Natural Balance because this is the food that's the most satisfying for them, keeps them full and in their best health. Until the last several months, they were eating Natural Balance Reduced Calorie Formula. My cats are both 6 years old, neutered, strictly indoor and only moderately active, so they need to be on a lower calorie food to keep them from putting on the pounds. I feed them both dry and canned foods. They both love this Fat Cats formula and I had no problem switching them from the Natural Balance Reduced Calorie to this. Apparently, it tastes just as good because there's never a leftover morsel in my house. I like this food for them for a variety of reasons:1) It keeps their weight down when fed in moderation according to the bag or how much your vet tells you to feed your cat.2) It's still satisfying despite being lower calorie. With some other brands of 'diet' cat foods, my cats were always hungry.3) Their coats look very shiny, I even get comments on how shiny, soft and healthy their coats looks, so obviously this food is giving them the vitamins and nutrients they need. One of my cats used to eat another brand of a low-calorie cat food and started getting dandruff and very dry skin. There seems to be a good balance of low calorie and enough fat for their skin health in this particular food.4) My cats are never sick. They only see the vet for checkups, shots and the occasional dental cleaning. No throwing up, diarrhea or smelly stools. Saves me on vet bills!5) Quality ingredients. Just read the bag compared to some other types of food, especially foods from the grocery store. There aren't added fillers or junk in this food. Fillers and junk just cause allergies, stomach or skin problems. This food has kept my cats healthy.If you are currently feeding your cat another type or brand of food, make the transition easier for them by adding a little of this to their current food over a period of several days to a week. That will help prevent any stomach issues as your cat adjusts to a different food. Some cats have more sensitive systems when it comes to diet changes.After feeding this food to my cats for several months now, this is the only dry food I buy since they're doing great. This 15-pound bag is huge and will last a long time even with my two big male cats. And, 15 pounds of food with real meat and high-quality ingredients lasts longer than 15 pounds of a low-quality cat food. They eat less because it's nutrient dense. It's so nice to have it delivered right to my doorstep rather than lugging it from the pet store. My cats and I love this product!

I really enjoyed reading this inspiring book. Serena Dyer has a wisdom and unique perspective for someone her age. It's obvious she's lucky to have grown up with the parents she did and to have experiences and opportunities that clearly broadened her perspective of the world and life. Her advice is helpful and the stories she shares from her personal experiences are interesting as well as relevant to the topics in each chapter. Serena's father, famous author and speaker Dr. Wayne Dyer, adds his thoughts and comments to the ending of each chapter. Serena has the self-awareness to see her weaknesses as well as her strengths and offers lots of great advice on how to change negative habits and thoughts. You can't help but feel more positive and motivated to become the person you're meant to be and move toward the kind of life you want after reading this book. 5 stars.

The size is good but it's made from a thin plastic material. I was hoping it would have the thickness and feel of a credit card or driver's license, but it's sort of a flimsy plastic. It works for now, but I don't love it.

I think it's essential to keep an emergency kit in your vehicle just in case you ever need it. Although this one includes a good, basic selection of items that one might need in an emergency, the quality of most of the items is just okay at best.First, 63 of the items are in the small ziplock bag containing first aid supplies. Then there are 25 small cable ties, so we're down to only 16 other items which makes a 104-item thing a little misleading in my opinion.I like the idea of the tire inflator, but after researching the BellAire 500 Tire Inflator that comes in this kit, the reviews on it aren't all that good. It seems like it might take a considerable amount of time to inflate a car or truck tire using this inflator.I do like that jumper cables are included, but I can't tell the quality of these based on just looks. They are much lighterweight than those in my AAA emergency kit.The other items are a blanket (feel like it's made of felt), a basic rain poncho, some thin cotton gloves (no grip on them), tire sealant spray, a small bungee cord, 25 cable ties, a plastic emergency 'Help' sign, a flashlight and batteries, a screwdriver and a few more things. It would be helpful if it included an emergency whistle and an aluminum blanket.Having a kit like this in your car or truck is better than nothing, but I think the cost is a little high considering the so-so quality of many of these items. It might be more cost-effective to pick up a collection of items individually and throw them in a bag or find an emergency kit with higher quality items. Comparing this kit item by item to the current emergency kit that I keep in my car that cost about $10 or $15 more, this one doesn't quite measure up.

I'm always trying to find things to help my dry, calloused feet, from pumice stones to sloughing creams or plain old Vaseline. This Dr. Scholl's foot smoother has helped a little, but I was hoping it would make a bigger difference than it did.On the positive side, the unit is easy to hold and very comfortable to use. The on/off switch works well. The rolling sander feels like very fine, smooth sandpaper against the feet. It's not uncomfortable at all. If you press too hard, it automatically shuts off so it seems like a very safe product to use.As far as removing callouses, it definitely smoothes callouses and helps remove superficial dead, dry skin on the feet, but I think it's too gentle of a product to help with moderate to heavy callouses or very dry/rough feet. It may work better with continued use over time, but it's not something that you can use a few times and expect to have baby smooth, callous-free feet. It's probably better suited for people with mild to moderate callouses or just to help rough/dry feet feel smoother. If you use it fairly often, you can probably prevent bad callouses from forming and keep your feet looking smooth and nice.I've been using it after my feet are clean and fully dry following a shower. When I'm done, I apply a moisturizing cream. I see a mild difference from using this foot smoother, but the smoothness seems temporary and the results aren't much better than with my 99-cent pumice block. Although I really like the idea of this product, I wish the pumicing action was more intense so I could see results faster. I also wish Dr. Scholl's would offer various types of replacement rollers (like sensitive skin, normal, extra-strength), so people could customize how light or intense of a smoother they need for their feet.I'm going to continue to use this and will update this review if I see an improvement, but for now I can only give it 3.5 stars.

I got these on Amazon at a really low price so I figured if they didn't work, it was no big loss. Surprisingly, they do work better than I expected. The scent is very light and subtle (but nice), especially after the first few days, but I have noticed they do neutralize odors. I put them in a smallish room that has a somewhat musty smell from old carpeting and these sticks have helped reduce the odor by at least 75%. This isn't a powerful air-freshener or something that puts out a constant perfumey fragrance like a plug-in, but they do seem to help reduce odors to some extent. I notice their scent, but it's very light. I have a bad perfume allergy and these don't bother me at all. I would likely buy more of these if I got a good price, for small rooms, bathrooms, a room where pets stay or a few in the kitchen. They don't work miracles by any means, but I do notice a positive difference in the room I currently keep them.Update: Scent has faded a bit after a couple of weeks. I don't notice the linen scent at all unless I'm fairly close to where I keep them, but the room smells cleaner and odors are barely noticeable. I plan to get these again if a good deal comes up.

I'm so over cords on headphones, so I got these to be able to listen to music or podcasts from my tablet or laptop and have the freedom to move around without worrying about a cord. The pair I got didn't arrive fully charged and wouldn't turn on, so I hooked them up to my computer with the included USB cord. It took less than an hour to get them 100% charged. They paired with bluetooth to both my computer and tablet very easily. I'm able to walk around to several different rooms around the house and still be connected. The headphones are very comfortable and lightweight enough that they're not distracting to wear. The sound quality is pretty good. Not as crystal clear as other headphones I have, but for the everyday user, they're probably good enough. The control buttons are on the side of the right headphone, so the volume and other controls can be easily accessed. The plastic case they come in can be used for storage. All in all, a good deal for the price for some comfortable, easy-to-use wireless headphones.

Very happy with my Sport ID bracelet. The small fits perfectly and the clear color bracelet isn't very noticeable, so I can wear it with just about anything without having an obvious bracelet on. It's lightweight, comfortable and I mostly forget it's on. It's waterproof, so I can leave it on in the shower or when I'm swimming.Signing up with the website and creating the online medical profile was easy and took just a few minutes. I like the fact that the online profile allows me to have much more information than with a regular medical bracelet that has to be engraved with just a few lines of info. The premium profile is free for the first year. After that, it reverts to the basic profile (a little less info) or you can pay $9.95 annually to keep the premium profile, which isn't a bad deal at all.I tried scanning the QR code and it worked perfectly to bring up my profile on the site. I definitely feel safer knowing that if I ever have an emergency, my medical info, allergies and emergency contacts would be available to doctors. Worth every penny for the peace of mind it provides.Update: Be careful when applying spray-on sunscreen when you're wearing this. My clear band turned more of a skin tone shade because some of the spray-on sunscreen must have gotten on the band.

This stuff does work to quickly dry out pimples. If you use it consistently, it seems to prevent breakouts. I use it only on the areas needed because it is very drying if I use it on my whole face. Benzoyl Peroxide can bleach or fade clothing, sheets, bedding and even your brows and hair, so apply carefully and don't rub the excess on your clothing or you'll get bleach spots.

I'm a vegetarian and got this to add some additional protein to my diet. I'm sensitive to carageenan and was happy to find a shake like this one that doesn't have that ingredient. The shake blends smoothly and doesn't taste grainy like some shakes. It's very chocolatey as well. It's sweetened with stevia and I personally found it too sweet for my taste which is why I deducted a star. If they can make this same shake with less sweetness, I'd buy it again.

I thought these would be towel size, but they're huge. They're perfect for keeping on hand in the pantry or linen closet for whatever purposes you might have. Lining a countertop, a makeshift table cloth for a small table, wiping up messes, lining your pet's bed or carrier, to throw over rising bread dough, wiping up spills on the floor, cleaning your car's windows, etc. etc. etc. They're lightweight but still very absorbent. I washed them on cold and line dried them, although you can tumble dry in the dryer. They wash and dry well and look like they'll last. The price for eight of these is a good deal. A very nice, useful product for any home or apartment.

My hair is thin and needs all the help it can get, so I picked up this mousse at the store to give it a try. It's made my hair look so much thicker and fuller. It holds style better as well. Even after sleeping on it all night, my hair still looks thick and lush in the morning. After towel drying my hair, I use about a golf ball sized puff for my medium-length hair, apply starting at the roots and working outwards. Then I blow dry. This stuff definitely works if you want to add volume to your hair. For the price, it's a steal.

I have noticed an improvement in my cats' teeth when I feed this to them regularly. One of my cats in particular has terrible teeth and gums despite professional teeth cleanings in the vet's office, so I have to work extra hard to make sure his teeth are clean. He hates having his teeth brushed as much as I hate brushing them, so this food is an easier way to reduce some of the plaque build-up before it can irritate his gums. Both of my cats enjoy the taste of this food. It's not a diet food, so I alternate it with a reduced calorie formula dry food for my chubby cat so he doesn't put on weight. But, for improving the dental health and keeping teeth cleaner, it does seem to work from what I've seen so far.

Photographer Mario Dirks landed an amazing opportunity to spend an entire year traveling and photographing some of the most fascinating places in the world and shares his experiences in this beautifully put together photo book.The photography on each page is eye-catching, creative and captures the essence of each destination. There's a mix of landscapes, people, sights that evoke the mood of its subject.Dirks also shares his shares his thoughts and day to day experiences alongside the photos to give the reader insight into his travels and how he was able to achieve particular photographs. You also get an idea of what each place is like to visit in case you're thinking of traveling there.The shutter speed, aperture and lense is mentioned with the photos as well.As an occasional photographer and someone who loves to travel, I definintely enjoyed this beautiful book to inspire great photography and find places to add to my travel wishlist.

I used after the Nioxin #4 shampoo to help with thinning hair. The minty scent is refreshing and combined with the Nioxin shampoo, my hair did thicken up after using it for a while. But, this is not a heavy duty conditioner that leaves the hair super soft and hydrated. My hair was always a little hard to comb through after using this, so I ended up switching to a deep conditioner for my everyday conditioner because my hair is dry and prone to tangles. As a light conditioner for people with thinning hair this works well, but if you have long or dry hair, or hair that's generally hard to comb through after showering, it may not be hydrating enough for you.

It's hard to find lavender perfume in stores, so I was happy to find this on Amazon for a good price. The lavender scent is lovely, as is the attractive bottle and packaging. It smells similar to other Yardley lavender products. My only complaint is that the scent doesn't seem to last that long.

These work nicely and hold up well. I throw them in a laundry bag and wash them with my clothes (on cold only) and they last and last. They're fairly small, so they're better for phones, lenses or tablets than bigger things like screens, but for the price, they're a good value because they're well made and don't wear out easily.
I can never get enough YA books when they are as great as this one was.  I am recommending that my library order it ASAP!
Holy cow my dogs went nuts for these.  I like that they are natural, and they do not smell bad, like most dog treats do.  The bag is a good size for the price.  All in all a quality product.

I know this is an ARC and all, but when a book is heavily dependent on graphics, and the review copy does not have the graphics, it is really hard to give an accurate review of the book as a whole.  The story was pretty good, but the graphics?  WHO KNOWS.

These are....ok.  They are extremely lightweight, and can store a decent amount of stuff if you are able to roll your clothes.  However, they do not seem terribly durable to me.  I am not sure I would recommend them.

My cat is obsessed, and I do mean obsessed with this thing. She has been bugging me to buy her more, and build a whole tube city with them.  Her goal is to move through the whole house without touching the floor.My cat is such a diva.
This is a nice convenient color coordinated set.  It would make a very nice housewarming or bridal shower gift.  The items in the set seem well made, and it is nice that they all match.
Trying this out for Tabletop Day today, and it seems to be a big hit.  Good for a variety of ages, a nice family game, easy to play.  Makes for lots of laughter and fun!

There was absolutley no new information in this book.  Everything from this book was pretty much directly from Helter Skelter.  If you want an intro to Manson without reading Helter Skelter, this is fine.  If you are looking for new information, keep looking.

This is a very nicely made tablecloth.  I am a little nervous, with it being so light, how this will wash up.  I have a black cat, so it takes about 4 seconds for this white tablecloth to be covered in black fur.  Only time will tell how this holds up.  As long as the cat stays away, it looks gorgeous.
Lovely luxurious sheets.  A nice fit, well made.  White makes me a little nervous, but these seem pretty easy to clean.

I have used this 2 nights in a row so far, and noticed a difference after the first use.  The arctic winter air is causing my skin to dry, and this is really helping rehydrate it.  I also notice a reduction in the size of my pores.  My only complaint is that it is easy to get too much dispensed, which leaves your skin oily.  All in all a good product though.

This chocolate is 3D, dark, decadent, and delicious.  In fact, it is so rich that one bar lasts quite a while.  I was able to savor a few small pieces as a nice post dinner snack.  Well made, very tasty, and well worth the price!

This bike is so super cool!  I first heard about these bikes a while ago, and the idea intrigued me.  This is a well crafted bike that folds easily and condenses nicely for storage or travel.  I am seriously considering taking this baby everwhere with me, so that I can explore.  It gives a nice smooth ride, and now I just need to wait for better weather to ride it more.

This stuff is amazing! I love the variety of flavors with the different fruits and nuts, and the bonus of dark chocolate. Helps with any craving- sweet, salty, or crunchy- and if fairly healthy to boot. Certainly better than grabbing a candy bar!

Maybe it is because I never used ine before, but I had a hard time puttung this on, and needed help, which would make it useless if I were alone. The construction seems sturdy, and it is super comfortable once you get it on, but putting it on was a two person job.

Seriously disappointed in these.  They have absolutely no taste, they are basically like crunching on unpopped corn kernals.  Disgusting, hard on your teeth, and no taste.  Take my advice, and pass.  Or, if you simply must eat something that has a similar taste, stick to the boxes your other amazon orders are shipped.

Great for meetings where you need to take notes or make action plans to share. I like that it has undated blank pages, meaning I can use it for as long as I need to, beyond a calendar year.  Great product.

My dogs just had this for breakfast and they went absolutely nuts for it.  With cold dry air and winter weather coming, we try to feed them some wet food every few days to keep their skin from getting too dry and help their coats stay shiny.  They love Cesar brand food, and they have it half gone before we can even get it into their bowls.
Very cute little stuffed dog, soft and well constructed.  May shed a little, but that just makes it seem more like a real dog, right?

This is the second set of Timeline cards I have gotten, and they are really fun.  A quick, educational game, and when you mix different cards together, it makes it even more challenging.  This is a keeper for sure!

I am so glad that Gecko has made this product. Anyone that does yoga knows the drill. You bring your yoga mat, in your yoga bag, but you also have your towel, yoga socks, yoga block, yoga strap, etc. And if you are going to a gym you probably have a change of clothes and toiletries. I was keeping all of my yoga items in a block sort of container, which was not very convenient for bringing everything to my office. This bag CAN!!! As you can probably see, it has a yoga area on the side. You just velcro in your mat. I was able to do this easily, even with my may in its bag/ carrying case. Then I just put everything I needed in the back pack! So convenient and now I am using it for strong all of my yoga items together (including a few videos). I did receive a coupon code to review this item, and I am so thrilled I did. If you know a person who loves yoga, this would be a great gift!

If you are looking for a great teacher's gift, this is what I am purchasing. I noticed my daughter's teacher had many things labeled with these types of chalkboard labels. I wanted to try some out myself. I received a coupon code in order to review them, and I to enjoy them. They come as a set of 48 with a variety of shapes. The set also came with a white chalk marker, which made it nice for a gift set. We have placed them on folders and notebooks and they work perfectly!

Wowsers! As others have commented, these are really stunning in person. I purchased them when there was a coupon on Amazon jewelry mostly because of the other reviews. They truly are beautiful and I have received many compliments on them! They would make a great gift for the holidays (I bought them for myself).

I got this bag on a fantastic deal! I really was not expecting much, but this bag is clearly worth its retail value. It is nicely made, rolls really well, and will actually hold quite a bit. I purchased two of these (one for me and one for my daughter) and my tween was even thrilled with hers. We took them on an overnight trip and they held up well thus far. I am super impressed!

We go through these power cords rapidly (due to a cat who enjoys eating them-- maybe someone needs to make a cat-proof one). The power cable has charged my iPhone just fine, and seems to do so rapidly. I have this one in my car, so I will report back in a month to let everyone know how it is holding up! I received a coupon code to review this cable.

We go through a lot of power cords because for some reason the cat loves them (mainly to chew on them), and it seems it is only the Apple cords that she does this too. We have been using this power cord for the past week with no problems. It charges well, is effective, and seems to work as it should. We will report back in a month at how it is doing (assuming it lives through the cat that long). I received a coupon code in exchange for an honest review of this product.

I am LOVING this head lamp! It arrived WITH BATTERIES (which I REALLY appreciate because I was giving it to my son as a surprise and did not buy batteries). The batteries actually come packaged with it, so it would make a great gift. The head strap is adjustable and can actually go to quite small and can fit a large adult head (we tried it out on my husband who has a large head). The light that shines is pretty bright, and my son has been having a blast crawling around his room at night. I could imagine it could be used for many things from looking under the car, to walking/ running at night. It is a nice unit and fit comfortably. I highly recommend it. We have only been using it 1 week, so we will report back in a few months to talk about how long it is doing long term. I received a coupon code to purchase this item at a reduced price in order for me to review it.

so, this is my first selfie stick. I cannot really compare it to other selfie sticks, but it seems to work great. It works exactly how I imagined it would and I can take photos of myself and the kids now. :) All of our photos are of just the kids and at best, one parent. We have been having a blast with this, and I am going to order another one for my daughter. I received a coupon code in exchange for my honest review of this item.

As a mom of 3 kids, I need something to better organize our luggage. Even if the kids bring their own small bags, I am packing toothpaste, medicine, and the list goes on and on. Plus my husband and my items go in the same suitcase, and it is just a mess. I love that these make everything separate for greater ease in finding items. I also used the to repack to keep dirty clothing from clean clothing (which was FANTASTIC because I just took the dirt laundry one and threw it in the laundry room when we got home-- and could put away the luggage without a ton of extra work). They seem really sturdy so far. We have used them for one trip. I will come back and update once they have been used a few times. I did receive a coupon code to receive this gift for a reduced price in exchange for a review.

I had to find a new activity tracker because the one I had was just not working for me. It was one of the wrap style bands, and it was just not comfortable. I was offered a discount on this item to review it, so I thought I would give it a try. So, I like the wristband. It fits comfortably on my wrist and had several sizing options. I also liked how easy it was to use. I had no problems uploading the app and syncing it with my phone. I cannot speak its complete accuracy for steps, but it does seem to track all of my steps (I was not individually counting every step I took to verify). I like its simplicity and ease of use.

I ordered these to be our back up set while we are camping. We keep them in the car, and this was a nice set that was easy to store. They all functioned really well. I primarily used the can opener, which was smooth to use and cut well. I received a coupon code, which reduced the cost of my order, to provide a review for the product, but I would have purchased the set even without a coupon code. It would be a great addition to a gift that included camping equipment, or even for a first apartment. I think I am going to purchase another set for an upcoming wedding.

I have a little artist who loves to draw . . . mostly on the walls. I was looking for something that was easy for her 5 year old hands to carry around so she could draw on paper rather than on my walls (because I can only magic eraser them so many times before it does not feel like "magic" anymore"). She has had a blast with this sketch pad. She brings it everywhere we do, and I love that it is something to occupy her in the car rather than watching a video or playing a video game. We will be buying more when she fills up this sketch pad because the price is really great too!

An odd product because even in the picture, this tablecloth does not look silver. I am unsure why it says silver, when it is clearly gold. I took a chance and ordered, assuming I would get gold, and I am glad I did. It is a beautiful tablecloth. The colors are really vibrant and the stitching/ pattern is really high quality. In the light, it actually gives off different hues in the sticking from green to blue, and it is just a beautiful effect. It has held up well and washed easily. I am glad I made the purchase!

At the beginning of the year, I was at the spa, and the lady giving me a facial had one of these nifty blackhead and blemish removers. It just basically took care of all of my blackheads. When I was offered a coupon to review the item, I knew I had to try it! It works so amazingly well! I have tried to many products to get rid of the blackheads on my nose, and NOTHING worked. This was quick and easy to use. I love that it has many different sizes to use on the different areas of your face! Great product!

I love water bottles. I strive to drink 120 ounces a day of water and have tried out many, many water bottles so I knew I had to try this one out when I was offered a coupon code to review the item. I love that this one has an infuser. I have tried many infusing recipes, but I think my favorite is lime and cucumber (I am not a fan of lime and coconut though). What makes this bottle superiors to others? Well, first it has a LID. When I first started using water bottles, this was not a big deal. However, at work, I take my water bottle down when I use the bathroom. Meaning I bring the bottle in the bathroom with me. GERM CITY!!! And nothing is covering the top with my other bottles. At least this one has a top in order to keep it safe. I also am notorious for not properly pushing the pull up type water bottles and making a huge mess. This bottle also resolves that easily. I love that it holds so much water-- making it easier to get my 120 ounces. Great water bottle!

This towel is so incredibly soft! I love it! It is also very absorbent and has been spending a lot of time at the beach with me. It has held up well through several washings and is the "must have" towel for the pool this summer.

The handle broke right off of our own lint catcher from our old dryer, and we needed a new one to replace it. The item arrived very fast, and we would not be more pleased. It fits and works perfectly! This was the lowest price I could find online!

I saw something similar to these on Zulily, so I decided to check Amazon to see if they were cheaper (they were). I read the description too fast and thought I was getting 8 sets (so I need to order another set). We used these for the 4th of July and they were a HUGE hit. People were asking where I bought them, how they worked, etc. You can screw them in BEFORE you boil the corn, which is super convenient. We also had success with screwing them afterwards too! The kids love them, and they were a lot more user friendly than the metal ones you stab in (and a lot safe for little hands!). What I love most is that these will not rust after a few times going through the dishwasher!

Overall, these towels are really well made. They are sturdy and thick. I received a coupon code that reduced their price in exchange for an honest review, and they do work. The only downside is, I don't find them to be very absorbent. I am not sure why that is, but I usually use flour sacks and these were not as absorbent. I am going to wash them a few more times to see if that will help.

I am so in love with this tablecloth. When it said it was spill resistant, I was expecting something that was a little more . . . rubber-y? It is a somply cloth table cloth, but is really spill resistant. The kids have spilled plenty of times, and none of it has gone to the table. Cleans very well in the wash and is a GORGEOUS pattern in person. I am ordering the butterfly one as well!

If you are looking at this product, chances are your dishwasher is not running 100%. We cleaned the entire dishwasher, and was honestly thinking of just replacing it. Then we found this dishwasher magic and it does work wonders. Our dishes are now coming out clean, and it was super easy to use. I just ordered 12 more (so we had a good stock of them!)

My oldest daughter got this chair YEARS ago, and it has held up well. My youngest daughter just turned 5, and HAD to have this same chair. I could NOT find it anywhere. Finally, it came up on Prime on Amazon! Hooray! The price was higher than I wanted, but I know it will last a while, and my daughter was thrilled.

I purchased this for my husband as a father's day gift, and could not be happier. We actually already used it, and it was simple to set up. the kids helped load the shish kabobs, which was tons of fun, and the clean up could not be easier! I will be buying more as a gift!
This skirt fits fairly small, so size up. The quality was just ok. It did not seem that well made, but was not cheap looking either. I will be wearing it, as it does have some stretch.

This shirt was a HUGE fail. I would strongly recommend against it. I actually wear an XL, and sometimes a 1X in tops (although XL fits better). I got this in a 3X. AN XXL!!! That means it is 2-3 sizes too big for me. Nope, still TOO SMALL. I ordered another top from this same company, and it fit fine and the quality was actually good. This top was too small, looked like something straight out of the clearance rack at the dollar store, and went straight to the donation pile. This is a DO NOT BUY for sure.

I purchased this so we could have "coloring time" in the summer and I could have something to color as well. I purchased 2, 1 for myself and 1 for my 12 year old daughter. We both love this book. It is very detailed and allows for tons of creativity. You should add a paper between pages if you are using markers, as it did bleed just the slightest amount. Fantastic book, and I will be buying more!

I am not really sure why I did not try Metromint before this, but I had not. I am so glad this was on sale at Amazon. It is my new favorite drink. My kids loved it as well, and it became the "asked for" drink in the house. I only wish I had purchased more! The mint and chocolate tastes are not strong, but just adds a hint of flavor and an amazing after taste.

I gave this to my best friend as a gift, and she was really impressed with it. It works well (she reports), and I can comment that it looks much more expensive than it was. She said it was super easy to use and has made her coffee making in the morning far easier.

I started watching this because my mom recommended it to me. It does remind me a lot of Resurrection. A LOT. So, if you saw that show and enjoyed it, you will probably enjoy this as well. We liked the first episode so much, we purchased the entire season (we do not have cable television). It is intriguing and each episode builds on the last, creating a really good story line. The acting was good, and I enjoyed the overall season. Here's to hoping these is a second season of the show.

My dog is a golden doodle and he gets STINKY in the summer. It is almost impossible to bathe him enough, so I was glad to receive a coupon code for this mist in order to review it. THANK GOODNESS. This could not have arrived sooner. It lasts quite a while, and my dog smells great! It was easy to use, and makes both me and my dog (because he gets petted more) happy!
I was pleasantly surprised as this shirt. It is very true to size and fit well. It looks really nice in person, and it will be perfect for summer!

I have a friend that kept raving about grill mats, but I really did not see the big deal. When I was offered a discount in exchange for an honest review, I knew I had to try them. I cannot imagine grilling without them now. I am, perhaps, the worst griller on the planet. I am that griller that will lose 1/2 of the food I am grilling into the fire, wasting so much food. My husband hates when I girl, which is fine because that means he grills almost exclusively. What I love most about these grill mats is that it makes grilling far easier. They heated well, left no mess on the grill (BONUS!) and I did not lose any food. They were so easy to use and easy to clean afterwards. Now I get what all of the fuss is about!

I was lolling for a charger a little larger than my standard "lipstick" chargers, and this was prefect. When I was offered a discount code to review this item, I thought it would fit into my needs for a charger well. I like the size and that it is a flat rectangle, making it far easier to set on a desk or table than the circular ones. It charges my device quickly. The charger is fast, convenient, and fit into my phrase perfectly.

At first, I could not get the speakers to work. There were not included instructions other than the photo on the back. What I found was that:1. The cable was not plugged in all the way to the second speaker. This was resolved by unplugging the cable and plugging it back in.2. The volume was not high enough for the speakers. Once I increased the volume, everything worked as expected.These produced a great sound (once I had them hooked up correctly), and the light show IS really, really fun.

I honestly do not know how I did not have these earlier. I have been using the paper ones for my entire life, but I was offered a coupon code in exchange for an honest review, so I thought I would try them out. It just makes so much more sense to use these. The paper was such a hassle. It would get stuck in the cupcakes, stuck on the pan, just stuck everywhere. These were easy to take out of the pan, easy to take off of the cupcakes, and easy to clean. My kids absolutely LOVE them. My daughter actually asked if she could keep them (she is 4, so I am not sure what she planned to do with them, but she thought they were much fun). My 12 year old keeps asking if we can make the cupcakes with them again, so they were a huge hit. Makes baking so much more fun and easier!

This worked fine over the several months. My original order details say their is a lifetime warranty, so I will be contacting the company, but do not expect many results. I purchased this in July 2014 and it stopped working completely last week. It will not charge my phone at all. It lasted 10 months, so perhaps I got what I paid for, as that is fairly long for a cable to last around here. So, if you are looking for something to last 10 months, this may be your best bet.

House Next Door was a book recommended to me last summer by one of my online "mom" groups. I have to say, the beginning of the book seemed fairly solid. I enjoyed the general plot line, and the first half of the book (approximately) was a decent read. I was able to get through it at a steady pace, and was enjoying the book. Then, about midway through, things took a turn for the worse, and the book went downhill fast. I did not enjoy the ending (I thought it was rushed and lacking), and it just seemed kind of to run out of steam. The characters never really went anywhere over the course of the book, and they all seemed very one-dimensional, especially everyone outside of the main focus of the book.However, if you like books about haunted houses, it is a decent read. It is easy to get through, hard to put down, and will keep you reading. I would say it is a good book to read when you are relaxing on vacation.

I would not say this shirt was comfortable or soft. I am not sure why that is the name of the shirt, but I find the fabric to be stiff and uncomfortable. I purchased it for my daughter for a concert, and the color was true to what is pictured, but it seemed like a really cheap, not well made shirt. Disappointed since most Hanes items we purchase we love.

I can only assume that it was the quality of the balloons, but they did not last us long. We had them blown up the evening before (because it was a Sunday birthday party and nothing in town was open on Sunday), and they added the extender chemical to them. By that evening they started to fall, and by the party they had almost completely come to the ground. A little disappointing for the price I paid for the balloons.

I will admit, I went into this film thinking it was going to be AWFUL. I also rented it on a flight, so my other options were limited in terms of entertainment. I actually really enjoyed the film. I did like the book, and so I was mostly interested to see how the book would be interpreted into a film. It was a decent. It kept me entertained for my 2 1/2 hour flight, and was compelling enough that it kept my attention. I felt the characters did lack some building, and I thought someone that had not read the book may be a little lost (but that is hard for me to say since I HAVE read the book). Overall, a fun little film.

I have been having real problems with my lower back, but it seems to only occur when I am riding in our mini van. The doctor suggestion I get a cushion, so I was thrilled to receive a coupon code in exchange for an honest review of this seat cushion. It provides a tremendous amount of support. I honestly was concerned because it said it was memory foam, but this is VERY supportive foam, while still being comfortable to sit on. I LOVE that it comes with a carrying tote because I can bring it in to work with me without a problem. It will also be fantastic for when we are traveling next month! I was honestly concerned about traveling cross country with my family because of the lower back pain, but this seems to have done the trick just in time!

These were a decent price for a set of 6, so I thought I would try them out. We have a metal closet set up that we installed ourselves, but the top shelf is very short, and I could not find anything that fit. I just needed something toe tore my handbags so they were not falling over, and this was perfect. They fit PERFECTLY and most of my handbags fit perfectly inside! Very happy with them. They seem very well made and were perfect for what I needed. I have them sitting with the opening sitting OUT, so I have easy access to my handbags.

This is such a great set of lip balm and it is so soothing. I have recently came down with a cold or allergies, and my lips became super dry and nothing was working. I purchased this product with a coupon code in exchange for an honest review, and phew! I am so glad I had them on hand. LIFESAVER for my lips and NOTHING else was working at all. I LOVE the smell of the vanilla-- that is my new favorite. Goes on, soothes and hydrates, couldn't ask for anything more in a lip balm.

I purchased this for my husband, and I honestly did not think we would get much use of it. We have so many items just SITTING in storage that have never been used. When he discovered it sucked up the leaves AND mulched them, he seemed pretty excited. And I don't get why this is such a "fun" thing, but apparently it is a blast because he has now sucked up all of the leaves, grass clippings, etc in the front AND the back.
