This is the perfect basic shirt for under a jacket or sweater. The material is a little thin to wear solo, but with these patterns, you want to accent that navy blazer or red sweater. The fit is nice, the look is fairly polished, and it washes spectacularly. And, the price is pretty much unbeatable.A very nice addition to your wardrobe!

The fit is absolutely perfect and this polo has a contemporary flair (i.e. it's not too long). It is not so heavy as to be uncomfortable and not so light as to look "cheap." (But, this is not "office-quality" ... if you want that, spend just a little more and grab a few by Chaps or Nautica).A nice wardrobe staple ... especially, for weekend wear.

This is the perfect basic shirt for under a jacket or sweater. The material is a little thin to wear solo, but it will provide a nice accent that navy blazer or sweater. The fit is nice, the look is fairly polished, and it washes spectacularly.A very nice addition to your wardrobe!

This is perfect to keep you warm on those chilly nights (and even days), but not so heavy as to be uncomfortable. If anything, it is almost a tad too close to the side of too thin. It has a contemporary fit (so expect it to showcase your physique). It is not meant for the work-place, but it does make a nice staple for those winter weekends.

This is the perfect basic shirt for under a jacket or sweater. The material is a little thin to wear solo, but it's really nice under a sweater or blazer. The fit is nice, the look is fairly polished, and it washes spectacularly.A very nice addition to your wardrobe!

This is the perfect basic shirt for under a jacket or sweater. The material is a little thin to wear solo, but with these patterns, you want to accent that navy blazer or red sweater. The fit is nice, the look is fairly polished, and it washes spectacularly.This pattern is particularly lovely! It looks gorgeous on my better half!A very nice addition to your wardrobe!

This is the perfect basic shirt for under a jacket or sweater. The material is a little thin to wear solo, but with these patterns, you want to accent that navy blazer or black sweater. The fit is nice, the look is fairly polished, and it washes spectacularly.A very nice addition to your wardrobe!

Man, these are not Slim Jims! You won't be "snapping into" anything here! These sticks are oily and somewhat soft: basically, they have no "fight" to them ... you bite and it falls apart. Since we only received a sampling, it's hard to tell if these "grow on you." Therefore, since all we are left with is a first impression, that impression is SKIP THESE. Ick.

These "Create a WWE Superstar" packs are a mixed bag. Some of the stars are barely recognizable (see Bray Wyatt and The Rock for a bit of oddness). However, this Kane one (while not a great representation of the athlete himself) is pretty cool overall. There are enough representations (or incarnations) of Kane that the set seems to translate well. And, there is enough "play" in this set that the young ones (and, even collectors) will be pleased.Check out all of these packs (some of the spectacularly bad ones are my favorite and the ones I would be most likely to purchase in real life). These make great little gifts for your nieces and nephews (as well as that die-hard WWF/WWE fan!)

Wow. This is something straight out of the WWE cartoon universe! The look is a hybrid GI Joe/John Cena (which, weirdly, seems about right). I wish he looked a little less like The Riddler, but it's still a nice figure for the kids.It's not odd enough for collector's to grab a few (for that, check out The Rock figure), but it is a great holiday gift for the little WWE fan in your life!

Man, when did Bray Wyatt get ripped?! I am so confused by this action figure! It is a touch Hacksaw Jim Duggan meets P90x. I think a figure that's a little more faithful to Wyatt's true physique would have been appropriate (and would have been more recognizable). Moreover, he's a bit too polished Wyatt. While it would be a feat to capture the man's aura of apathy (concerning his personal hygiene), this guy looks like he could be in an Axe commercial.Collectors might find this bit of oddness cool. And, kids will enjoy anything with "WWE" emblazoned on it. However, know that very little of this appears like the real life Wyatt and you'll be fine.

As someone who fondly remembers gummy candies from early childhood, I have tried endless variations of vegetarian "gummy candies" over the last twenty years ... all have been more like "jelly" than "gummy." Now, here is the first truly "gummy" candy that has that resistance and chewiness of an actual gummy candy. AND, it warrants noting that these candies have a GREAT taste. Sweet but not too sweet.I would love to tell you that this bag lasted for two weeks and I had a few each day. But, my excitement upon tasting these meant that the bag was gone within three days!! I was legitimately giddy with excitement and could barely control myself from eating the entire bag in one happy sitting (that would have been a seriously shameful dinner).If you are a vegan/vegetarian looking for something analogous to the gummy candies of yore ... here they are!! Enjoy!

I remember being a wee-tot and seeing Yul Brynner's face on the television. My mom was watching a VHS copy of The King and I. So, basically what you have here is the most remarkable Yul Brynner action figure with a WWE spin. In no universe does this anything like Dwayne Johnson ... not even the tiniest bit. It's rather remarkable actually. It appears they have gone out of their way to ensure this looks nothing like the iconic figure of The Rock.WWE collectors may wish to skip this (or, may wish to grab two of these bizarro figures, I don't know). And kids would probably like to add it to their collection regardless. So, know the person you are buying it for and purchase accordingly.

Not only is this super inexpensive, but it works like a charm. It is the equivalent of an off-brand one that you might find at Wal-Mart but without the excruciating pain of actually going to a Wal-Mart. Man, the savings you love without the craziness. Call me, SOLD!!Does its job and is a great price. Win-win!

Prior to owning this, I kept my mouthwash in a basket under the sink ... and my toothpaste in one drawer along with my floss picks. It wasn't wildly inconvenient and, certainly, the minor bit of work to gather my hygiene products did not deter me from completing my twice daily regimen ... however, these new OXO bathroom items do simplify my routine. I like that. And I very much like the polished look of these pieces.Now, I noticed that a few folks may have neglected the instructions that accompany this dispenser. The included instructions plainly state that this is made for display and use in one bathroom. It explicitly states that this is not meant for travel. Therefore, do not expect this to accompany you on your next road trip (since it will leak ... because it's simply not intended for such purposes).If you are seeking a simplified routine with a touch of polish, consider this new line from OXO.

I was dubious about the effectiveness of this aroma-theraputic eye-mask. Then, I tried it. First, I tried the chilled version ... it was nice but had little effect on me (personally). Now, my boyfriend LOVED the chilled version. He found it truly relaxing after a long day working on the computer. On the other hand, I warmed this for thirty seconds, crawled into bed and put it on my eyes ... I remember the soothing fragrance of lavender and then nothing at all. I had literally fallen asleep in under one minute. An hour later, I woke up totally surprised, the now cold mask still on my eyes. Since then, I have tried this several times: always warm, always with the same remarkable results.If I lost this in a resort or hotel, would I buy a new one? In a heartbeat!Not only does this help one to relax, but (for me) it was a natural sleep aid. I love it!

With so many sophisticated, cool cases, it seems that Belkin has really struggled to keep up with the competition. The price of this case is a little surprising for a basic piece that does virtually nothing to protect one's investment (outside of minor scratch protection).Ours arrived with three huge stickers stuck to the cover and side. We struggled to fully remove these (and had to repeatedly try to get rid of the sticky residue). Talk about not leaving a great impression. To this very moment, I can see the shadow of a large rectangle on the cover of the case.I guess we are used to OtterBox and LifeProof ... because when we looked at these, we knew they probably wouldn't last the month. Belkin needs to update their products or drop their prices. Either way, something needs to happen to make these cases relevant.

I would recommend getting a size larger than normal because these felt a bit small compared to other "large" boxing gloves.  They are very tight which is uncomfortable.  At first, it was a little unbearable with how stiff the padding felt, but that gets much better.  The gloves secure with a basic Velcro strap through a buckle which allows the gloves to be easily put on.  The ventilation slit in the middle of the glove goes higher up the palm than other gloves I own which allow for more air to get in.  This will easily suffice for practice on a bag.

We added this to a fairly extensive Proactiv regimen. We were pleased with the immediate results. And, perhaps because one of us has been using the Proactiv collection for so long, there we no unwanted side-effects.Now, the price is a little steep. Therefore, grab this if you are already a fan of the line and are well-stocked on the other components (since this is not an absolute must-have ... just a nice little luxury). So, if you have a little extra birthday cash or a gift-card, give it a try!

Foremost, we are HUGE fans of Disney's Descendants. We have nearly all of the dolls in the collection and were anticipating making this a part of the children's playtime. When it arrived, we were a little taken aback by the shockingly low quality. The mirror is fairly unusable (but an actual mirror could shatter and be dangerous, I suppose). The wristlet is a rubbery thing that the girls refuse to play with since its "weird and ugly." And, the entire set is worth about $5.99 (if that).It's difficult to imagine that this is a true Disney product. This is a rare stumble for a unusually fantastic company.

This was our lowest ranking doll in the collection ... and it still fell in at a solid four stars. It seems that Audrey doesn't have the grace and elegance of her fellow dolls in this series (which is fine, she does her own "thing"). The dress is a little lacking (but still cute). And, the silliness in her hair is a tad unflattering (but that can be altered). On the positive side, she has the sweetest expression and the cutest shoes.Don't expect the sheer elegance of Mal or Lonnie and you'll be fine.

What a beautiful, "edgy-but-age-appropriate" doll! Every detail in her face and hair is just "the cutest." Likewise, the outfit is beyond charming! The layers of "cool" here are unreal! Likewise, I adore her little boots .. absolute perfection!This is the perfect addition to your Disney collection! It is well worth the investment!

I imagine being a child again ... and this is my DREAM doll. Everything about this doll is absolute perfection! Mal's hair and makeup are perfect beyond all words. Likewise, her gown is just layer upon dreamy layer. So gorgeous and so age-appropriate. (And, no detail is overlooked!) Moreover, her little accessories are the best: a pair of shoes, a wristlet, and a wand).This doll is super posable and easily lends itself to imaginative play.These are the perfect alternative to Barbie dolls. They are sweet, wholesome, and just so beautiful!! Worth every dime!

The beauty of this doll nearly defies words. Not only is her expression "pure Disney," but her gown is unbelievably gorgeous. And, Lonnie's long hair is so incredibly beautiful. This little doll is a child's dream come true!In addition to her gown, Lonnie comes with shoes, a wristlet, and a hair comb.She is super-posable and wonderfully age-appropriate.These are a fantastic alternative to Barbies. Truly worth every dime!

This doll is wonderfully precious. Her expression is the epitome of Disney - big eyes, gentle smile. Likewise, I love her intricate gown and gorgeous little accessories (a wristlet, shoes, and a bracelet).These provide a wonderful alternative to Barbies. These dolls are sweet, age-appropriate, and lend themselves to imaginative play.These super posable dolls are a welcome addition to our collection.

I was skeptical about this product when I first received it.  After using it, I am very happy with the results. Essentially is it a belt that you wrap around your stomach with three gel pads attached.  You control the intensity of the shocks with a remote attached to the belt to force your muscles to contract, simulating a regular abdominal workout.The controller can alter the power of the shocks on the left side and the right side independently from 0 to 99. At higher values, the shocks actually become pretty painful.  I usually never exceeded 80 as it became too unbearable. There are also seven different programs which increase the intensity, frequency of the shocks, and duration of the entire workout. While the controller automatically progresses to more difficult programs after periodic use, I have always manually set my own program. (usually program 3)After using this for about a month, my pants feel light they fit a bit better.  I have not changed anything with eating habits or additional exercise so I attribute all changes to this belt.  It should be noted that this will not help you lose weight as it only helps tone ab muscles making you slimmer around the waist.

This doll is absolutely lovely. The details in her face are precious. Likewise, I love that the little bracelets on her arm are not removable (no little bracelets for me to step on and break by accident). Moreover, her gown is gorgeous, age-appropriate, and elegant. Ditto for her pretty little accessories (shoes, a wristlet, and a necklace).What I absolutely adore about these dolls is their grace and poise. I would give these to any child without a second thought. Everything about them is infinitely appropriate.Super posable, gorgeous little doll!

After using this on my hand for about a month, I can say there is some improvement.  The spots appear to be slightly lighter after a month of use.  I can only assume that results will further improve after using it for an additional two months.  It comes out as a clear gel that can easily be applied to any area.  It dries quickly with no odor.

These are perfect for jogging or any cardio.  The shoes are very lightweight and comfortable.  The material of the shoe is a breathable plastic mesh which will work well for any type of exercise. The problem with this however is if you happen to step in a puddle or if you happen to get caught in the rain, your socks will get wet.For those wanting to purchase a pair, I would recommend getting at least a half size larger than normal.  My experience with PUMA sneakers are that they usually run smaller than other shoes and this is no different.  These are also quite narrow so the larger size will help in that aspect as well.

There normally isn't much to say about multi-outlet surge protectors.  They are convenient or almost mandatory for those who need multiple items plugged in simultaneously in a single area.  The special caveat this brings is the special energy saving outlets.  There is one master outlet, three regular outlets, and four energy saving outlets.  The three regular outlets and the master outlet are always on.  The energy saving outlets are only on when the device plugged into the master outlet is on.  For example, I have my computer plugged into the master outlet and the monitor, speakers, and amp plugged into the energy saving outlets. This allows for all my computer peripherals to be used when my computer is on and when it is off there is no additional electricity is used.

We have several different iterations of Monopoly. Most rely on neat aesthetic differences (which we actually really like). Our Futurama set is, by far, our favorite. Now, this Monopoly is significantly different from most other versions. This might be a fun and welcome change for many ... and an annoyance for other. Likewise, the pieces here were not exactly ones that anyone cares to "fight over." We just each selected a random landmark ... no one really cared. As far as game play, the passport idea made it distinctly different and gimmicky, but it seemed to translate as exactly that.I think that since we usually just enjoy small alterations (and amusing tokens) and admire the structure of the actual original game, this was not a smash hit for us. However, for a group of teens with no particular experience with this classic game, this has the potential to be a hit (outside of the slightly off-putting tokens ... from the perspective of a teen, of course).

This is perfect for everyday use. It is much lighter than our old one, has little cup holders, and remains securely in-place. Now, I do agree that the padding is a little too light for longer journeys. Therefore, we still have our old seat in the other car for vacation trips and those road-trips to visit family. Therefore, other than lacking a bit of luxury (and the price kinda indicates that), it gets you to your destination safely. And, that's the goal.There were no issues with it being compatible with our vehicles or with the child fitting in the seat. Likewise, the aesthetics are fairly nice.A nice choice for most parents. (Parents with heavier children might need to see this in-store and give it a trial run before ordering it here).

This is a nice beginner jump rope for people wanted to add double unders to their workout routine or just want to try it out because of its low price.  The rope in this much like many other speed ropes are a basic corded wire.  However the main difference between this and other pricier ropes lies in the bearings in the handle.  This handle has a rotating head with a hole which the rope goes through so the rope, when spinning, goes only clockwise or counterclockwise.  On other handles, the rope is connected to the handle through a ball bearing which also rests in a rotating head.  This allows you to have less friction no matter what position the rope handles are held.All that said, this is still a great rope for the price and the amount of friction or speed loss will be negligible to all except for those who are serious about double (or triple) unders.

We had to work harder than I would have liked to get this game "up and running." In fact, I had given up at one point and simply tossed it to the side, but my boyfriend decided to make it "his goal for the night" to "get this thing to work!" While it did eventually happen, the process was so annoying, so not-at-all-user-friendly, that I couldn't help but feel a little biased against it from the problem-riddled set-up issue.In the end, I guess it is an okay trivia game (we have piles of trivia games without the gimmicky aspect) ... but be prepared for a truly challenging experience in getting this whole thing aligned/synced-up. We have not touched it since that first evening.

Here's the thing, one of us in this household is a total toner junkie. I mean, two or three times a day. So, this just fueled that passion. Now, here's the thing: if you are accustom to the refreshing feel of toner, refrain from using this too frequently, too quickly (someone regretted that a few days later). It's pretty intuitive that it you go crazy with this (which is so easy, because it feels "nice"), you skin might become a bit irritated. So, take it easy, limit yourself a bit, and use it in conjunction with the Proactiv line. For us, ultimately, the results were outstanding. This has become the "must-have" product right now (which can get a little pricey ... so that's why holding back and be helpful also).A great feel with great results. Love, love, love!

Foremost, if you use this in moderation (which is where you will get the best results), it is a fantastic product! The scent is light but pleasant, it does not leave skin greasy-feeling, and it does seem to improve skin quality/clarity. (Now, I say "seem" only because we have nearly the entire line ... so it can be a little difficult to tell if it is a synergistic effect or if the incredibly positive results are from a single product). Moreover, while it is expensive, I think you might be able to justify it by reminding yourself that it is a nice sized tube, the a "little goes a long way," and that people treat themselves to anti-aging creams for quadruple the price (many of which are considerably less effective and less studied than these fantastic products).This is one of many Proactiv products that truly makes skin "better." For us, it is worth every penny.

This Proactive product has more pluses than minuses. The biggest "plus" is that, like all Proactiv products, it works. However, there are a few drawbacks. Foremost, you will need to clean your razor much more frequently. So, there will be tons of that "run-it-under-water and *tap* *tap* *tap*" thing. Additionally, it is crazy expensive. Even if used sparingly, it is super expensive. But, again, when used as a part of the entire line, it makes a world of difference in one's skin. So, for us, it was worth the steep price tag (but I can also, definitely, see why others find it cost-prohibitive).I think the bottom-line here is that it is not a must have, but it is a really nice complement to the overall line. If you have those few extra bucks (or a gift-certificate), I think you will be pleased with this product's overall effect.

I've gone through an awful lot of these over the years. Currently, this one is my favorite. It does not slide, I am not perpetually "aware" of it, and the fit (even on my skinny spaghetti arms) is perfect. Moreover, it fits and hold my iPhone well. I have not had a single issue yet (other than looking goofy ... which they do).Outside of being a little pricey, it is worth your investment!
Great little doll.  My daughter loves it.  Her dorm room is all Myazaki, so this fits in well with her other stuff.  Price was great, doll is cute.
This is so great!  I keep my non-face pens in it.  Everyone who sees it loves it- even people who don't even know who Totoro is!  It holds a lot of pens- so it's useful.
These are great!  I love the fine tip.  And of course they are super unusual and fun.  I enjoy using them.  I get a lot of compliments on them.
Super ugly.  Not only did these not fit, but they were ugly.  I love boiled wool shoes, usually, but these are just not very nice.  They make your feet look larger.

Great backpack.  Very roomy.  Not a lot of pockets, but the color is great, and it matches a Pendleton hat I have.  I Also love that it is waterproof.  It's as much for women as men- I'm going to enjoy it as a woman!

I just love this!  I ordered the 2X first, but it was too big. The 1X was excellent.  It's a gorgeous garment.  it washes well, and it's very light- great for travel.  I found the top more than generous.  I am a 42C, 18/20, and 5'9".  The 1x fits perfectly!  Not tight, but doesn't gap (like the 2x did)

They aren't shoes- not sure why I have to rate them like that.  These are adorable, and such a deal!  I paid a lot of the black kitty (as much as all of these cost!)  So I ordered 3 packs for me and my girls.  These are big enough to put mints in, or keys (and I love keeping my keys away from the other stuff in my purse.)  These seem well made, and they are super super cute.

So cute.  So flattering to a plus sized woman.  The Trim is lovely, and it looks great with sweaters.  I love how fast it dried, and I will definitely travel with this.  It looks great with jeans, but you can dress it up if you want to.

This is every bit as good as everyone said it was.  I was looking for a mask that would not touch my eyes- I hate that feeling.  This is perfect!  I can actually sleep in this.  There is no eyelid mask contact, and it's comfortable.  You don't have to adjust it to be horribly tight in order to keep it on.  I love the little bag it comes with too. Very nice.  Has a pull string, which you can attach with a carabiner or clip to the inside of your purse, so you'll be able to find it even in the dark.  I don't wear makeup, so I don't care about that aspect, but I HATE things touching my eyelids.  And I love this!  I can finally block out the light and sleep, because I just can't use the masks that touch my eyes.

We really liked this series.  Super interesting premise.  Good acting.  High drama and suspense.  Clearly they put some money into this production, and it shows, and the writing is crisp and intelligent.  I especially liked the young actors- they did a very good job.
What a deal. i wish they weren't made in China- but you can't have everything.
Wow- I love these mints.  I like the ingredients.  I love the taste- a little like an adult version of a Necco wafer, in mint.  I like all the C Howard flavors- but mint might be my favorite.

The fit is tent like- and I would not say it's attractive, but I did like that these jackets matched my shirts.  I think they look better open (zipped up, to my eye they look too much like maternity clothes).  The material is like a light sweatshirt- and I think the details are "cute"- but this certainly isn't the best designed Buddha jacket.  It's a little weird.  But I liked the colors, the weight, and I got mine very cheap (all under thirty dollars).

This runs at least a 1/2 size small.  I have other size 8 Rothman rings- but this one is impossible to even get on my finger.  So disappointing.  If you have small fingers, you will probably be pleased.  It's a very pretty ring- but I don't think it runs true to size.

LOVE these!  They run large (which is why I bought them).  Normally I'm a 2X or 1X in Buddah- but this XL fit perfectly!  I'm 5'9" so it's a little shorter on me than on the model- but I love the ties!  So cute.  Very attractive, and slimming.

I ordered these because people say they ran large.  Normally I'm a 2X in Buddha (although in one type of pant I can get by with 1X)  Because people said these ran large I took a chance- and they're great!  I love them.  I would not want the waist any looser- and the legs are generous enough that they're not skin tight.  Really attractive cut- very slimming (nice for someone like me, with a big butt).  I'm normally a 20 in pants, and an 18/20 overall.  I'm 5'9"- and the length is very nice on me.

These are great.  They nest perfectly, when not in use.  And they hold a lot.  I use the big one for sushi, the middle one for veggies, and the smallest one for dessert.  Super easy to clean- I wash mine by hand.  They hold a lot more than you would think they would.

This smells SO bad!  I'm hoping it will air out.  It's very cute, but also hard to open- you really have to push.  I thought it actually didn't open all the way- but then I pushed really hard, and it locked in place.  If you really love Totoro, you'll probably like it.
It's cute- but delicate.  This isn't a very functional bag.  But if you like Totoro you'll like it.

Super cute- sure, I wish it wasn't made in China, but it's so cute, and my daughter loves it, and the silicone thing is great for this and all her other tea cups- just darling.  Nicely packaged in a cute box (if you were giving it as a gift).  Our silicone lid came tucked inside the cup.

This runs small.  I'm 5'9" and an 18/20, and a 42 C.  The front opening on this gap over my breasts.  The arms are right- and I do not even have particularly large arms (I'm a pear, so my weight goes to my hips).  I think a 3X probably would have been fine.  The fabric is like heavy T-shirt material, and it's not bad looking- but it really does run small.

If this were the correct size, I would have liked it- but it's not.  The bottom will NOT fit easily over your butt, and look like it does on the model, if you are really a 2X and you order a 2X.  I'm an 18/20, and I could keep this and wear it tucked in (because I'm more like a 16 on top) but I really wanted a tunic.  The material does not stretch, and it is VERY see through- so you'll have to wear a cami under it.  My suggestion is to order up one size.  A 3X probably would have been fine (though loose up top).  The sleeves are great (I'm tall) so if you're short- you may find them too long.

I'm very happy with this.  It fits me perfectly.  I got the 42C, and it's comfortable, and there are no gaps.  I wear it all day- no shoulder strap slippage- which is GREAT.  I love not having to grope myself to chase my shoulder straps around in my blouse.

This rather plain shirt runs somewhat small in the arms.  If you have large upper arms it will not be comfortable.  I do not have large arms, and it's a little binding.  I like the color and fabric, although it does wrinkle- but it's very comfortable.
very cute.  My daughter loves this.  I bought it to match the tote with the same pattern.  We are very happy with these.  My daughter gets lots of compliments on this wallet!

These shoes seem quite big to me- both wide and long.  I wear an 11, and usually shoes are tight and too short, but these are LARGE.  I wear big fluffy thorlo socks with them, and then they fit.  Not everyone likes to wear thick socks- so if you don't, these shoes might be a problem.  I don't think the arch support is very good- at least it isn't for me, and it's not a "soft" cushioned shoe- but I think they are cute,and quite feminine and I'm willing to put up with the negatives.  I wish I could tell you which size was right for you- but it will totally depend on the size of your foot and the type of sock you wear.  I'd buy the size you normally wear, and a size smaller- just to have both- and then I'd send back the other size.  I ordered a 10 as well- but I felt it was too tight.  However, I have EE feet.
Very cute.  I bought this for my daughter and she loves it.  I don't think it's very well made, so I took off a star for that- but other than that it's very cute and nice.  It's definitely dramatic.

It's nice.  It's heavy.  It looks more expensive than it is.  I get a lot of compliments on it.  It looked lovely with black or white clothing, especially.  I think it's pretty dramatic- I bought the matching necklace as well.
My daughter loved this.  It was a birthday present for her along with the matching wallet.  It's cute.  It goes with almost everything.  It seems relatively well made for a somewhat inexpensive tote.

This is plain, but very nice.  It fits well, seems true to size, and is comfortable.  It wrinkles a bit when washed, but it's a casual top, so I don't care.  I got it in all the colors, and I'm pleased with all of them.

I love this.  I'm 5'9". an 18/20, and a pear shape- and this is great!  It's so slimming!  I got the white, but I'll get more colors.  When you smock the front with the ties, the bottom because amazingly slimming!  I could not believe how cute it was.  And it's comfortable.  The buttons are detailed and adorable.  Unlike many Buddha clothes, this one does not seem to run small (at least for me, a pear- which means, it fits over my bottom without binding).  I do think if you carry weight in your arms, you might want to try two sizes- because it does seem fitted on the top.  It's a lovely length, and I'm very very pleased.

If you want the top to fit the way it does on the model- I think you need to order up.  I am an 18/20 in clothes (5'9", 42C bust).  I liked the 3X- which was loose, like in the picture.  The 2X was more fitted, and I didn't like that was well.  The top is quite pretty- even prettier than the picture.  The lace edging is good quality, and should last a while.  I think the top is more of a yellow (ecru) color than I saw on my monitor (it looked more creamy white)- but I love the ecru!  It's great.  I've very happy with the top, and I love the length (tunic length) because it is very flattering, and elongates my figure.

I bought this in 1X and 2X- I'm an 18/20, and never know which will fit (5'9", pear shape).  For me the 2X was far superior, since it wasn't tight over my butt.  I wanted the tunic to hang loosely- as it does on the model, and I get that with the 2X.  I ordered the white and the blue, but I'm only keeping the blue.  I thought the white was less attractive, in person.  I also worried that with it's long length, if I sat down on something, I'd stain it and ruin it- and since I want this for outside wear, white is probably impractical.  The blue is very bright- it's an electric blue- but it's very flattering.  The arms are long, but not too long for me- however I'm tall.  I do not think a short woman would look very good in this- it would "swallow" you.  It's a garment for taller women.  The length is marvelous and slimming!

This is an adorable jacket.  I ordered the 1X and the 2X- and I liked the 2X best.  I wanted a loose fit, and I can close it with one of my large pins, if I want to- the 1X didn't give much overlap in front.  It's a nice weight- medium- like a sweatshirt.  I'm 5'9" and an 18/20- pear shape.  I like my clothes loose and unconstructed, and so this was perfect.  If you want a fitted garment, this won't be too your taste.  I know I will wear this a lot- it's dressier than a sweatshirt, but not as formal as a blazer.

I'm very happy with this.  I didn't have to time to get this when I visted the Neues Palais- and I'm so glad to find it here.  I was buying it as a souvenir, to look through to relive my memories.  It's not a "research" book or anything.  These books were sold in the gift shops outside the palaces in Potsdam.  They are very nice printed, and the pictures are good.

It's ok- I don't recommend it.  I thought it would be better made, and cuter- but it's kind of disappointing.  On the other hand, kids like it.  So there you are.  As an adult, you might not find it all that great.

I thought this was really unflattering.  Because the lighter section is in your middle, it makes your middle look bigger- not exactly what most women want.  Also, the color was much worse in person- I sent it back.  I also thought the fit was short- I'm 5'9" though (size 18/20) and I have gotten used to longer, more tunic length shirts- I thought this was like that, and it's not.

Wow- I ordered 500 because it was the best deal and because of the great reviews.  I am SO glad I did.  I've jazzed up my tea (cold and hot) with the lemon (delicious!)  I have used the lemon and the lime in cooking (fantastic on baked chicken or fish) and I've used it in rice, and pudding and frosting!  Have not baked with it yet, but plan to try that.  It's great in mixed drinks, wonderful in fruit salad, super good in yogurt (with honey!).  This is a fantastic product.  I could not be happier- I'm just sorry I did not know about it before.  (Ladies- keep a baggy of these in your purse for restaurants- because I've tired of dirty bar lemons, and now I just use these- it's MUCH tastier, and probably a lot cleaner.  Nice for restaurant tea as well.)  And I love that I will never have rotting lemons on my counter again!

I wish I had ordered a bigger one.  I ordered XX because I am an 18/20- but it is way small.  I liked the sweater feel of it- and I think it might have been pretty if I'd been able to figure out what size I was.

Nice Buddha product.  It's a little odd in the torso area- took one star away for that, but it's comfortable, and I liked the olive color of the shirt.  I think if you carry weight in your stomach you'll have trouble with the fit on this, unless you order up a size.

This is very very cute.  It has a snug, but not tight, fit- I ordered the 2X- I'm a 42C, 18/20, and 5'9".  The neck is adorable on- such a nice detail, and I like the sleeves better down- but they are cute both ways.  The color scheme is flattering.  I wish the navy on this matched the navy of my skinny pants by Buddha, but it doesn't- the shirt is much darker than the dye lot of my navy Buddha pants.  That's a problem for me- but only a slight one, and I certainly won't take a star away for it.  I'm really happy with this- and glad I ordered it in all the colors.

Usually Buddha clothes are somewhat small.  Normally I wear a 2X (I am an 18/20, 42C, and 5'9")- but in this the 1X fit great!  I had ordered both sizes- the 2X in the lighter color- and I'm going to keep both.  The 1X will fit great over tanks and T's and the 2X will be perfect for sweaters.  The length is really flattering- covers the rear- and the details are very cute and attractive, and not weird- sometimes Buddha clothes go overboard, and are just weird, this is just very sharp looking, and interesting, and not at all odd.  I think this may be my favorite Buddha piece (although I also love my thigh length car coat and my skinny pants).
I don't know why Amazon thinks this is a shoe.  It's cute.  My daughter loved it.  The color is very bright, and it looks like it will last.

I am not a fan.  First, the whiter sleeve makes your arms look big. Mine are not particularly big, but this mad them look big.  The fringe (imo) is cheap looking.  It reminded me of the fringe my grandmother had on a cheap sofa throw cover.  And it's weird it's only in front.  On top of that, the back of this is rather high cut- emphasizing your rear end.  I sent it back.  I'd ordered a 1X (because I'm an 18/20, and sweaters usually run big).  It fit fine, but I didn't think it was flattering.

These are very cute, but the material is SUPER thin.  They won't last long if you try to wear them all day. I ordered two pair for my daughter- since she loved them.  One pair came with a gash in the "leather"- and I could tell it was paper thin.  That said, if you can get them cheap (we paid fifteen per pair) they'll last long enough to make the purchase worthwhile.  My daughter loved the comfort and the look.

Love this.  It's comfortable.  It dries fast and is easy to wash.  It's super flattering.  It's light weight (and great for packing for trips).  It's cool to wear, but gives good coverage.  I was afraid the stripes might not be flattering (42C, 18/20, 5'9") but it's very flattering.

I really like this.  I think it's much prettier in person (I almost didn't get it, because I wasn't sure I liked the way it looked).  In person it's super sparkly- and it sits right in the hollow of your neck (it as adjustors, so you can position it).  It's small, but noticeable (because of how sparkly it is).  It does not catch on things.  It's comfortable to wear.  I like that the pendent actually stays where it is supposed to stay (and another FR piece that drifted around quite badly).  Catch is easy to put on.  Have had many compliments on this.

I bought 4 different patters of these when they were on special and I was too lazy to send them back, but I'm not all that happy with them.  I think they look cheap.  That said, I've certainly seen worse, and the colors are nice.  They're very light weight- so spring and summer wear.

This might even run big, if you don't like your sweaters loose.  I normally wear a 2x, but I bought the 1x in this so it would be more form fitting and I could wear it under blazers.  My advice would be- buy your own size and one size smaller, and see what fits your purpose best.  I bought the 2X and then had to go back and buy the 1X, because no one had reviewed this, and I didn't know how they fit.  The knit is not super heavy, the material is of a middle weight and soft and silky.  I washed mine on hand wash in the machine and hung it up to dry and it looks great.  It's an old fashioned style, but very flattering, and it looks fantastic under blazers!  I'm a 42C, and 5'9" (and normally an 18/20) and I find the 1X is very flattering and form fitting (but not tight!).  It's also a very nice length- most things are too short on me.  The sleeve length is super nice, as long as you don't try to wear it under a blazer or sweater that has tight arms.  I own all the colors in this- and they are all lovely.

I didn't find it all that boxy- and I have a small waist (for my size).  I'm a 2x, and a 42C. I love the way this makes me look- it's nice and loose, without being sloppy, and it's slimming.  It's lighter than I thought- an airy knit, which makes it great for summer.  It's not tight and form fitting (except over your breasts) which is exactly what I wanted!  I went back and ordered another- because I'm a klutz, and I'm afraid I'll snag it.  It IS delicate- but if it wasn't, it wouldn't be so pretty.

Ok, These are not "Genuine" DJI props,  but I run these on my Phantom 1.1.1 when hauling a load and they do very well, it keeps the quad very stable, the props feel flimsy, I don't know how they will do on the phantom 2, but so far they are doing great for me, I run my regular 8045 props when just flying around, etc, because I get much better speed and agility, But when I put my camera on I slap these props on, get a much smoother light and actually longer flying times, and it seems to reduce the heat output on the motors and battery, Just my experience, Experience may vary with others depending on how you have your gains set, etc and what payload you have.

I was skeptical, I fly RC helicopters and one particular helicopter I have burnt out a total of 5 motors so I purchased an aftermarket heatsink for the motor, I tried that for a while but was still burning out motors, So I took a try with this stuff, I put it on the aftermarket heatsink before installing on the motor, I also put some on the oem heatsink/frame and after 3 flights I can tell a BIG difference, It is pulling a LOT more heat off the motor and distributing it on the heatsink and metal frame, For RC applications this is well worth the small investment, and the folks I purchased it from delivered it LIGHTENING quick, I am very happy with this purchase and will most definatley purchase again!

First off, I'd like to say, that I love that this came come with instructions, almost EVERYTHING I've ordered when it comes to assembly of my quadcopter di not come with any kind of instruction, This one did, and Good instructions too, I Installed the unit on my Quadcopter, went through calibration and setup, then took it outside, flew great twice, I mean it was beautiful everything was in Sync so good and the copter did'nt have a single twitch in it, so I got two beautiful 12 minute flights out of it, the third day I went out, plugged the quad op, everything went through there calibration sequence, etc.. started throttling up, got about a foot off the ground then it just dropped, luckily I wasnt any higher, the ESC is DEAD, no life whatsoever, The company was great to take care of the situation and refund my money, but I'm going to benchmark this thing and see what the problem is because I love the concept of an all in one and it did run so smoothly, on the occasions it worked :) I'll keep you guys informed.

Fist off, let me say I am very happy with this purchase, I was a little nervous purchasing something of this scope on Amazon and actually having it delivered by a Tractor Trailer truck to my front door but hey :)  Anyway, After getting and  taking it out of the crate I started the assembly, Be sure to read fully all emails sent to you by the vendor, they include important links to videos to help you assemble this thing, Really it is mostly assembled but this is not a toy, This is a vehicle for on the road use so you need to go over it with a fine tooth comb, be sure to put loc-tite on all the nuts and bolts, check your fuel lines and brackets, etc sometimes these things come loose during shipment, and also check on them from time to time with routine maintenence, Change your oil after your first couple runs, be sure to be easy on the engine for break in period, if you do this and follow those videos you will have yourself I nice scooter that will last a long time, these run good, look good and if maintenenced right they will last forever, They are very simple to work on, there are even upgrades and mods out there, stick some LEDs on it, make it your own.. Enjoy your TaoTao :) I know I am mine :)

This is a great 4 channel Helicopter, An excellent starter copter, The Radio has many functions and is very close to being hobby grade, I hate to compare with the WlToys v913 but I am, I have both, I'm able to control the v913 better in turns, banking etc it seems smoother, This one seems to have a little more power behind it and is also built rock solid, the motor holds up well, In the same time frame I have replaced motors in the v913 3 times  this one has not given any trouble, I dunno why but there ya go, both are great choppers, I prefer the v913 over this one but I'm still giving this a 5 star because it is an excellent chopper and is built good.

These are priced great, Fit the Optimus f3 like a glove, and very durable, put the first one on something like 4 months ago when I first got it, and still using it. The thing any of the screen protectors though is you need to learn how to install them, on previous phones sometimes it would take me 3-4 tries before I could get one installed correctly, get in a DUST FREE area and be sure you are dust free, clean your screen very well, any little spec left on your screen will create a bubble that will not go away, follow instructions for installing then work bubbles out with a little small keychain grocery store discount card, I've always had best luck using those.

This is an excellent product for the Hubsan X4, yes it does add a little "lag" to your experience but it is still very fun to say the least, I can be more daring with it now knowing I will not damage the props, and whats very cool is "Sticking" it to the roof of the house because it gives a suction cup effect, anyway I put this on my X4 the day it came and have'nt taken it off, and Have not replaced one prop since then either :)

I don't understand some of the negative reviews I've seen on here, are people installing these wrong or what are they doing? I put mine on as soon as I received it and it's been on there since, I've even taken the navigation unit off and on a few times and one time accidently slipped while I was putting it on and gave the holster and extra heavy tug and it still stayed on.. No problems here, Excellent product, Excellent price.

Great upgraded battery for the hubsan x4, Yes it adds a little more weight but the extra flytime you get from it is worth it, Learn proper use and maintence of lipo batteries and it should last you a good while.
The FlySky TX/RX system is excellent, and these rx are priced very good, not much else I can say because they work well, never had a problem with them..

I auction off silver in 1 gram increments and these bags are perfect to ship them in, Also I hear that people store makeup, etc in them, I'm not even going to mention the illicit uses people use these for, oh wait I did.. anyway.. it's a great deal for these. you get 1000 of them in 10 seperate bags of 100..

This is an excellent TX/RX combo I use mine for FPV flight on my quadcopter but they can also be used for many other uses, plug them into a 12 volt power source and you're ready to go, Lightweight, sturdy, and do not put off much heat, and not too power hungry.

These are priced fairly well but they need to be because my v913 has burnt out a total of 4 motors, I don't know if it is because I fly them hard or what but I always limit my flight time and always leave plenty of time for the motors to cool before the next flight.Otherwise I'm fairly happy with these motors, They provide ample power to get the 913 in the air and have some fun.

This is a great flight controller but lacks documentation, It would be hard really to provide documentation for these because there can be so many different uses for these, Not just for aircraft, you can use these for robotic, cars, just about anything you can imagine, It could come with documentation or diagram or something mapping everything so you don't have to go through so much trial and error.

This is a great canopy, and the vendor I purchased it from had a great price for it. The paint on this canopy seems higher quality then the pain on the one that came with the v913. It doesnt chip as easily and looks bolder also.

This is an excellent diagnostic unit, especially for its price, there are MANY android apps you can download for free to use with this. Plug into your cars diagnostic port, pair it to your phone, connect with your FREE software and you are ready to go, it pulls error codes up quickly and you can search them right there on your phone, then share the findings via SMS or facebook or anything with some of the apps, I would recommend this to ANYONE!

I had two uv-b5 and one charger, the charger I originally had the LED did'nt work correctly and it was hard to tell whether your battery was actually charged or not, well I sold that charger with one of my B5's and bought this one for my other, This charger does not have that problem, The led works as they should and the charger just works great.

This a must have for anyone who owns the X4, I mistakingly put a discharged battery back in my X4 and flew it. I was flying over the house when the bird fell out of the sky and splattered my roof, I have a metal roof so it slid off easily, I did'nt check the damage on it and put it back in the air and it started flying circles, One of the arms were broken. Luckily I had already ordered this kit and it came in the mail the next day, You will need a little soldering experience to replace the body but it's not that hard, just take a photo of the X4 before you go to switch things out so you have a reference to where everything goes. this is very valuable package to have when flying because you WILL crash, you WILL tear stuff up.
this tail unit combo works better than the stock one that comes on the 913, it has betters response when turning
these bad boys work great with Multi-Wii flight controllers, I pick up an average of nine GPS satellites with this

these are not kids walkie talkies, your kids will be breaking many US laws by using these unlicensed, otherwise Baofeng Makes great products, these amazon sellers just need to learn how to market them!

This charger has been holding up real good for me so far, I do regular charging of 1S lipos and Balanced charging of 2-4s lipos with no issues whatsoever, it gets a little hot when discharging some of the batteries but it is supposed to get a little hot, the heat from that energy is supposed to go somewhere, I do not believe it will be a problem though.. if it is I will just put a fan on it somewhere.

These work good for what they are, But, some of the pins slip out of the plastic header if you are trying to couple solder them, etc they seem to do fine when soldering to the board, I do notice that the plastic header strip seem to not fit with the ones on my Multiwii controller so these seem to sit a little crooked on the board, there are no other issues with them though.

These cables are priced to move, they hold up well, the plastic coating is durable, yet flexible, it don't feel like some of that cheap brittle stuff you get with some wiring, the plugs are very strong and put together well, they do not wiggle around like others so you have much less chance of something shorting out.

These cables are priced to move, they hold up well, the plastic coating is durable, yet flexible, it don't feel like some of that cheap brittle stuff you get with some wiring, the plugs are very strong and put together well, they do not wiggle around like others so you have much less chance of something shorting out.
This is a very nice Radio, especially for the price, it is feature packed and could control just about anything you stick your receiver on, This is a must buy!
This has been a great power supply! I use it for a balancing LIPO battery charger and it is doing a great job. It does not get hot and it holds its course through the full charge or discharge.

I don't know if I was sold a used unit or what but I could'nt really even get this thing in the air, the gyroscope or something must be broke in it, I know how to fly helicopters and quadcopters and this one will not fly, packaged it up the next day to send back for refund.

This little cable is a necessity for those who are into rc or ham radio, there are so many uses for this cable I will not even begin to list them. if you are technically inclined and like to tinker, Buy this you will use it!

I purchased this hoping I would get a better signal than the built in WIFI adapter in my laptop, well it gets about the same or at times worse signal, So if you need one for a replacment for a broken device, Yes it would be good. but don't purchase this thinking you will get better signal just because the external antenna.

This is a must have for many devices, I use it for my Multiwii flight controller and also the I2c navigation uses, I'm sure this will have many more future uses for arduino devices, I'm also a ham radio operator and it could easily be converted to a programming cable for a radio if needed.A++++++ in my book!

I've had this hub for a few days now and so far it has provided me with all my needs. I'm able to plug in charger devices like my lipo helicopter chargers and phone chargers, I also have an external soundcard, bluetooth, keyboard, and other devices I swap around. The unit does not get hot, the power supply is staying cool also so I would highly recommend this hub.I will update the status of this review at a later date if anything changes.

I was using this with a LIPO battery charger, drawing a MAX of 4 amps and this PS is rated at 5 amps so it should have handled it, Well about mid-way through the charge cycle this PS got VERY VERY HOT, almost too hot to handle. Thats when I canceled the charging cycle, let it cool down and started again, I have tried it with smaller lipos and drawing around 2 amps does fine. Maybe I received a faulty unit, I Dunno but I've ordered a replacment. The vendor did quickly make it right with me so everything is cool.
The topic should cover it all, You are stupid to try a soldering job without these. They are built well and are priced great, It's so nice now to have four hands instead of two!

These adapters are priced to move, Some would think, Why are you selling these in multiples of 3, Well really thats the most cost effecient way for the seller and the buyer. Parts are bound to wear out or get mutilated in a crash so for the price it's better to just get three of them and have the others for spares :)

These are good little props and priced very good, And Cheerwing is ALWAYS quick to get your stuff out to you incase you had a mishap.As the other reviewers has stated, These props almost need no balancing out of the box and that's saying a lot.Good quality products at a great price from a great vendor, it can't get no better than that!Thanks Cheerwing!
I don't know whats up with all the bad review this little feller gets, this is a beautiful helicopter and it flies great to only be a 3 channel helicopter, and for the price you cannot beat it.

This is a great little bluetooth module for the Multiwii board but as far as I know everyone of these things are not ready to go out of the box, you Must hook up a TTL-USB converter so you can plug into your computer and use PUTTY to make a serial connection to this device to change the Baud rate from 9600 to 115200, other than that this device is perfect, for this reason this device gets 4 stars.

This is a great addon for the WLToys V913, Just take the sideplate off, take off one of the original metal pieces that connect from the motor to the frame, then snap the heatsink right on to the motor, this little thing helps to disperse heat very well, Wish I could give you some techinical info on this but I do not have a thermometer to take temperature reading. I can tell a big difference in temps though.*UPDATE 2/5/2014*The heatsink works much better with thermal grease, otherwise your better off just sticking with the design WLToys has provided you with.
There is not much to say about this item, It is a great replacement swashplate for the WLToys V913 Helicopter, It is an exact fit and holds up well, Great parts at a great price, who can beat that?

Please read closely because this battery is not truly universal, it will not fit the popular hobbyking XT60 connection on their power distribution board. To me this seems like false advertisement because if it was truly universal it would fit all popular connectors and it does not.

Love these little things, This is a must if you have anything that requires Lipo or Li-Ion batteries, they check the voltage of your battery per cell and also you can set an alarm for it to go off at a certain voltage.for a 2s 7.4v battery I set mine to 3.3v that way when the alarm starts buzzing I have about 30 seconds to get the aircraft landed, these are very loud so you should have no issues hearing them in the air.I own a few of these and the are a very valuable resource to have.

ok to start out, you will not be able to fly this thing like you will the 911, of course not this thing is a giant, but it has all it's own qualities.First off, it is very well built, its sturdy as a tank, sometimes a believe god has a strange sense of humor because every time I order a new helicopter it seems to be very windy or storming when it is delivered, I was tired of just sitting there looking at the shear beauty of this beast so I took it out in the heavy wind and started "learning" to fly this thing, I crashed it into the house twice, but a couple dings on the canopy but thats about it.. So the moral of the story is, Be patient, wait for a good day to fly this thing, it doesnt do well in heavy wind but of course it does better than the 911.secondly, I love the radio remote, this one is pretty much a hobby grade remote, its a nice one, and it can control the v913, v912, and v911 and I believe a couple of the quads too.for me the purchase was well worth the money, it's keeping from going into withdrawl until I get all of my quadcopter parts in :)***UPDATE 1/20/2014***I've owned this helicopter less than a month, First off (trivial) they sent me a helicopter with a different color canopy than advertised.secondly I love this helicopter, it is fun to fly and is very durable, But I've take 1 star off the overall review (why?) I've owned thishelicopter for less than one month and the main motor has already burnt out. When I fly this chopper I always wait a full 30 minutes beforeI put the battery on the charger, then it takes the battery 1 hour to charge so the motors have a total of 1.5 hours to cool down before thenext flight so that is ample time for the motors to cool down, So I do believe this is a defective motor. I've ordered a replacement motor for itbut I have contacted the seller about this because I believe the parts should last over a month on these, I will update later on what happens.*** 1/21/2014***The Seller (DealMeDeal) has contacted me and Said they would ship me another Main motor, Excellent! Great customer service, I might have jumped the gun and ordered one already but now I will have a spare.

I'm very happy with this tester/alarm you can hook it up to a 1~8s battery and it gives you individual voltage per cell and also total voltage of battery back, You can also set an alarm to buzz when a cell gets to a certain voltage, This is a must have for lipo batteries so you don't destroy them.

What can I say, It's been so long since I purchased this item I don't remember when I did.How can you tell when you have a quality item?when you forget that you even own it!I've had this SD card for ages, I've used it in my Wii, My phones, and now my RC helicopters and sometime forget it is even there, that is great quality!

the bullet and the cord did'nt last long at all. It charged my phone fine for about 2 weeks then one of the connections on the cord must have came loose or something because it would only work half of the time, So i just replaced the cord with a straight one I had lying around the house then the bullet stopped working about a week later.

I use the batteries for my UDI u818a Quadcopter, they are better batteries than the OEM for this particular quad. They have more power, last a little longer and really they fit better, I did have to put a piece of tape right under the F in "force power" to keep it from slipping out of the cradle in the U818, but the overall fit is still better.Great batteries at a great price, who can go wrong with that? and the vendor I purchased them from had them shipped to me in 9 days from China so this purchasing experience has been great, I will update this review if anything new comes to light.

This is a great little kit to have If you own or plan on purchasing the WlToys V911 because sooner or later you will need it, I've retrieved mine from a tree twice and have had many crashes before the parts started wearing out, I bought this kit and pretty much just built a new copter from the ground up, I salvaged the motors, bearings, and the board from my old copter but everything else come from this kit.It's always nice to have some extra gears and blades laying around because you will crash and you will wear these parts out.

2:11 MinsThis is a great flying little quad, although it has been fairly windy since this has been delivered I have still enjoyed it, it does fair in light wind but it is a very light little machine and a gust of wind will pick it up and carry it away fairly quickly, It's a tough little bird though, I hung it up in a tree yesterday and instead of freaking out I looked and saw how it was hooked to the tree then I flew it right off the branch fairly easily, then instead of getting hung up even further up the tree I let it fall the rest of the way down, it smacked just about every branch on the way down and really don't even have a scratch on it.The camera is a fairly decent little camera although I upgraded the MicroSD card fairly quickly, the 1gig card fills up pretty quick. I use a USB cable to copy the video files to my computer instead of taking the SD out every time I'm sure taking the card in and out so much will wear it out fairly quick.The remote is great, it feels comfortable in hand and has digital trim settings and a digital readout showing throttle setting, remote battery life, trim settings, camera settings, etc, it also has the 360 inversion button you can tap to make the quad do flips, be sure to have some altitude before doing this a be ready to hit the throttle again to keep the quad from hitting the ground, you can also use the top left button for this, press it and when it starts beeping you can tap you rudder controls up, down, left, or right ta make it flip in the direction you like, this is a little more fun than just the 360 inversion.Other than that there is not much more I can say about this Quad other than I love it, I do plan on building my own quad in the future and this is giving me some great training on the physics of a quad and how to fly one.Let me add that some proper care an manteinence of your LiPO batteries will make them last long, There are many videos on Youtube on proper care of your batteries but here are some tips.* Your batteries will come from the factory charged, but not fully, Charge them fully before flying.* Do not run your battery down all the way, leave about 20% power in the battery, you can purchase voltage alarms that will buzz at a specified  voltage.* after flying wait about 15 minutes for battery to cool down before re-charging.* when putting batteries up for storage do not fully charge them, charge them about 80%.
Great little battery, fits snug in the 818a, holds up well gives about 7-8 minutes flight time, I think maybe a little overpriced though, you can find 800mAh batterys for just a dollar or two more..

Yes, this helicopter may be slow and clunky but I'd like to say I love this little bird, I just crashed this thing into my swimming pool, I go to retrieve it and the lights and PCB is still powered up!, I retrieved it, took it in, unhooked the battery as quickly as possible and took a hair dryer to it, dried it up real good and hooked it back up and it flies again, this one is a tough little bird!

I used these on my Syma S107C with upgraded battery, these replacement parts are a little bigger than the one on the S107C but with the upgraded battery the bird flies real steady and is quicker than ever, Very happy with these parts.
